original: Atleast one owned province belongs to the §YCossacks§! Estate.
translation: 拥有的省份中至少有一个属于§Y哥萨克§!阶层。

original: This estate represents the families of landed aristocrats in your country. Their privileges are guaranteed by old traditions and most have originally been won through performing great services to the state. Their traditional responsibility is to fight and protect the realm against outside dangers as well as help the ruler keep the peace.
translation: 这一阶层代表了你国家中的那些贵族门阀世家。其特权由古老的传统保障，大多数是他们的祖先最初通过为国家服务而赢得的。他们的传统职责是保卫王国抵御外来危险，并帮助统治者维持和平。

original: This estate represents the educated priests of your state religion. They have a long tradition of serving in the administration of your country and their traditional responsibility is to care for the spiritual well-being of it and your people. Over the centuries they have acquired both land properties and privileges from former rulers as well as pious individuals.
translation: 这一阶层代表受过良好教育的国教教士。他们拥有为国家行政服务的悠久传统，其传统责任是关怀国家与平民的精神福祉。在过去的几个世纪中，他们从先君和虔诚的信众手中获得土地资产与特权。

original: This estate represents the urban population of your country such as Artisans, Merchants or others that reside inside city walls. Their traditional responsibility is to work to keep the economy going and in order to do so efficiently they expect to be granted special rights and privileges for themselves and the cities they represent.
translation: 这一阶层代表国内的城市居民，比如艺术家、商人和其他定居于城墙内的人。他们传统的责任是为保持经济发展而工作，为此他们希望自己和自己所代表的城市能得到特权和优待。

original: The Cossacks are the free people of the Steppes. Their background varies, some have been born on the grasslands while others are escaped serfs from the great latifundia that border the wild fields. Great raiders and hardy settlers, the Cossacks aspire to be recognized as an estate of the same importance as the Nobility and to strike down at anyone who would attempt to limit their freedom.
translation: 哥萨克是草原上的自由民。他们来源复杂，有的生于牧场，有的是从邻近荒野的大庄园中逃脱的农奴。哥萨克是强大的劫掠者和吃苦耐劳的居民，他们渴望获得与贵族一样地位，并会击倒任何企图限制他们自由的人。

original: Originally a term reserved for Christians and Jews the Dhimmi are the non-Muslim subjects in a Muslim realm. Their status and privileges can vary greatly between different states as do both their organization and numbers. Traditionally it is the responsibility of a just ruler to protect these people while keeping them apart from the Muslim majority. These principles are not always as easy to keep in parts of the world where the Dhimmi may constitute the majority of the population themselves however.
translation: 「齐米」一词最初是用来指代基督徒和犹太人的，现在则指穆斯林王国中的非穆斯林臣民。其地位和特权，就如同他们的人数一样，在不同的伊斯兰国家间区别很大。传统意义上，一个公正的统治者应该在让他们与信仰穆斯林的主体民族隔离开的同时保护他们。然而，由于有些地方的齐米阶层反而构成了主要人口，这一原则并不总是能够那么容易维持。

original: The ruler of a nomad realm must always strive to keep control over the many tribes that make up his lands. As there are no strong or permanent institutions in the same way as in many sedentary states the tribes are the primary source of authority and acts as everything from tax collectors to soldiers or raiders. While the Tribes consider the ruler of their state the foremost of them they expect to be given large land areas to feed their horses and support their lifestyles as well as to be granted influence over most of the day-to-day matters of the state.
translation: 游牧国的统治者必须始终致力对构成其土地的众多部族维持控制。由于缺乏像其他定居国家那样强大或永久的制度，所以麾下各个部族就是国家权威的主要来源，充当从征税者到士兵或者掠夺者的种种角色。在部族认可国家统治者是他们中最权威的一员的同时，他们渴望得到更多的土地去养马、支持他们的生活方式和对国家日常事务的影响力。

original: Colors your provinces according to which Estate controls them.
translation: 根据控制省份的阶层的不同对你的省份上色。

original: Click on a province on the map to set it as a province of vital interest.
translation: 点击地图上的省份将其设为你的重大利益所在省份。

original: Because of the fort in $FORT|Y$, this had no further effect on the province.
translation: 由于$FORT|Y$的要塞，这将不会对这一省份有任何进一步的影响。

original: Projects a Zone of Control in all adjacent provinces that stops hostile movement and prevents rebels from adversely affecting provinces when taking control of them.
translation: 当控制要塞时，会在所有相邻省份产生要塞控制区，将阻止敌军移动并防止叛军产生不利影响。

original: The Tribes have grown so powerful they assumed de facto control over our country.
translation: 部族阶层发展得过于强大，以至于被认为是国家的真正掌控者。

original: The Aristocracy have grown so powerful they assumed de facto control over our country.
translation: 贵族阶级发展得过于强大，以至于被认为是国家的真正掌控者。

original: The Clergy have grown so powerful they assumed de facto control over our country.
translation: 教士阶级发展得过于强大，以至于被认为是国家的真正掌控者。

original: The cities and guilds have grown so powerful they assumed de facto control over our country. Real power now lies in the hands of a small group of wealthy Plutocrats.
translation: 城市和行会发展得过于强大，以至于被认为是国家的真正掌控者。国家权柄被掌握在少数财阀团体手中。

original: The Cossacks have grown so powerful that they have broken off to form a country of their own, outside of our control.
translation: 哥萨克阶级发展得过于强大，以至于脱离了我们的掌控，分裂出去并成立了一个属于他们自己的国家。

original: The Dhimmi have grown so powerful that they have broken off to form a state of their own, outside of our control.
translation: 齐米阶级发展得过于强大，以至于脱离了我们的掌控，分裂出去并成立了一个属于他们自己的国家。

original: §YThere are disloyal Estates in your country!§!

Estates with a loyalty level under $MIN|Y$ will result in a negative modifier for your country and unrest in provinces they control.

The following Estates are disloyal:
$LIST$
translation:
忠诚度低于$MIN|Y$的阶层会给国家造成负面修正，并导致他们控制的省份发生叛乱风险。

下述阶层不忠：
$LIST$

original: Colonial Nations cannot take overseas provinces.
translation: 殖民地国家不能占领海外省份。

original: This will increase the loyalty of the $ESTATE$ Estate by §G$VAL$%§!.
translation: 这会增加$ESTATE$阶层§G$VAL$%§!点忠诚度。

original: This will decrease the Liberty Desire of §Y$NAME$§! by $VAL$ (currently $CUR$).
translation: 这会降低§Y$NAME$§!$VAL$点独立倾向（当前为$CUR$）。

original: Instrumental in the building of Canals: §Y$VAL$%§!
translation: 在运河建设中发挥作用: §Y$VAL$%§!
对酒精、烟草和咖啡征税: §Y$VAL$%§!
教士阶层月度忠诚修正：§G5%§!。
教士阶层月度忠诚修正：§R-5%§!。

original: This amount of land increases their influence by $INF|Y$ ($AMT|Y$ influence per §Y1%§! of your total State development, capped at $MAX|Y$.)
translation: 省份数量提高了此阶层$INF|Y$影响力（每§Y1%§!总直属州发展度提高$AMT|Y$影响力，$MAX|Y$封顶。）

original: The $ESTATE|Y$ do NOT have the $VALUE|Y$ influence modifier.
The $ESTATE|Y$ do NOT have the $VALUE|Y$ loyalty modifier.

The $ESTATE|Y$ have a loyalty level of $LOYALTY|Y$. Loyalty is determined by your past actions towards this Estate, and changes by $CHANGE$ every month towards $NEUTRAL|Y$. This corresponds to a yearly base change of $BASE$ from the current loyalty level
translation: $ESTATE|Y$阶层的忠诚度为$LOYALTY|Y$。忠诚度取决于你过去对该阶层采取的行动，且每月将改变$CHANGE$趋向$NEUTRAL|Y$。这相当于从当前的忠诚度水平上每年的基础变化为$BASE$。

original: which corresponds to a yearly base change of $BASE$.
translation: 这对应于每年的基础变化$BASE$.

original: Since they demand territory, their loyalty will also decrease with $MALUS$ per month, for a total change of $CHANGE$.
translation: 因为他们要求领地， 其忠诚度将每月降低$MALUS$，降低总量为$CHANGE$.

original: An Estate's loyalty determines the overall effect they have on the country. So long as their loyalty is at least $THRESHOLD|Y$, they will provide bonuses both in the provinces they control and across the entire country, but if they should ever become disloyal, they will instead provide country-wide penalties as well as increased unrest in provinces they control. The strength of their country-wide bonuses and penalties depend on their level of influence. You can increase an Estate's loyalty by granting them control of provinces. The Estate's loyalty will drift towards $NEUTRAL|Y$ over time.
translation: 一个阶层的忠诚度决定其对国家的总体效果。只要他们的忠诚度不少于$THRESHOLD|Y$，他们将为其控制的省份和整个国家提供好处；但如果他们变得不忠，他们将反过来给整个国家带来危害，同时他们所控制的省份也将增加叛乱度。他们为整个国家带来的好处和危害的强度受其影响水平所决定。你能通过授予阶层对一个省份的控制权来增加其忠诚。阶层的忠诚将会随时间而逐渐趋于$NEUTRAL|Y$。

original: An Estate's influence is the power they wield in the country. A high level of influence will increase both the benefits provided by a loyal Estate and the penalties suffered from a disloyal one. An Estate whose influence increases to more than $DANGER|Y$ is at risk of seizing power in the nation.
translation: 一个阶层的影响代表他们在国内所能支配的力量。高影响既会提高一个忠诚的阶层所带来的好处，也会提高一个不忠的阶层所带来的危害。一个拥有多于$DANGER|Y$影响的阶层将会给国家带来夺权政变的危险。

original: It will have the following effects in the province:
translation: 这将给该省份带来下述影响：

original: §RBecause their loyalty will still be below $AMT|Y$, this will have the following effects in the province:§!
translation: §R由于其忠诚度依然低于$AMT|Y$，这将给该省份带来下述影响：§!

original: §GBecause their loyalty will be above $AMT|Y$, this will have the following effects in the province:§!
translation: §G由于其忠诚度高于$AMT|Y$，这将给该省份带来下述影响：§!

original: With $PROVINCE|Y$, the $ESTATE|Y$ will have the following effects on your country:
translation: 与$PROVINCE|Y$一致，$ESTATE|Y$阶层会对你的国家产生以下影响：

original: $PROVINCE|Y$ cannot be granted to the $ESTATE|Y$ due to:
translation: 无法将$PROVINCE|Y$授予$ESTATE|Y$阶层，原因如下：

original: $PROVINCE|Y$ is not currently held by an Estate.
§GClick to open the Estate selection menu.§!
§RYour type of government does not have Estates.§!
§GClick to grant this province to the $ESTATE|Y$§!
Province has already been assigned to an Estate.
translation: 该省份已被分配给一个阶层。
这会花费你 §Y10§! 点人情。

original: Because $COUNTRY|Y$ does not expect to gain anything from this war, calling them will cost you $AMOUNT|Y$ Favors.
translation: 因为$COUNTRY|Y$并没准备在这场战争中获得什么领土，召唤他们加入战争会花费你$AMOUNT|Y$点人情。

original: The §YNobility§! Estate will gain §Y20§! influence for 10 years.\n
translation: 10年内§Y贵族§!阶层会获得§Y20§!影响力。\n

original: $PROVINCE|Y$ is controlled by the $ESTATE|Y$, increasing their influence in $COUNTRY|Y$ by §Y$INFLUENCE$%§!.
translation: $PROVINCE|Y$处于$ESTATE|Y$阶层控制下，这使他们在$COUNTRY|Y$的影响力增加了§Y$INFLUENCE$%§!。

original: §RBecause their loyalty is below $AMT|Y$, this has the following effects:§!
translation: §R他们的忠诚度低于$AMT|Y$带来如下影响：§!

original: §GBecause their loyalty is above $AMT|Y$, this has the following effects:§!
translation: §G他们的忠诚度高于$AMT|Y$带来如下影响：§!

original: §RYou can only use $INTERACTION|Y$ once every $NUM|Y$ year(s). You will be able to use it again on $DATE|Y$.§!
translation: §R$INTERACTION|Y$每$NUM|Y$年只能执行一次。能再次使用此项互动的日期是$DATE|Y$。§!

original: You can only Ask for Contribution from this estate once every §Y2§! years.
translation: 每§Y2§!年只能要求该阶级供奉一次。

original: \n\n§RThis province is under siege and thus cannot be revoked.§!
translation: \n\n§R这个省份正处于围城战中，因此无法被收回。§!

original: \n\n§RThis province is not under our control and thus cannot be revoked.§!
translation: \n\n§R这个省份不在我们控制下，因此无法被收回。§!

original: \n\n§RThis province was recently granted to the§! $ESTATE|Y$ §Rand cannot be revoked until§! $DATE|Y$§R.§!
translation: \n\n§R这个省份最近才被授予§!$ESTATE|Y$§R，因而在§!$DATE|Y$§R前都无法被收回。§!

original: To grant this province to an Estate, you first need to select the Estate in the Production Interface.
translation: 要把该省份授予一个阶层，你首先要在生产界面里选择阶层。

original: Click to revoke this province from the §Y$ESTATE$§!.
translation: 点击从§Y$ESTATE$§!手里收回该省份。

original: Do you wish to revoke $PROVINCE|§Y$ from the $ESTATE|§Y$?
translation: 你希望将$PROVINCE|§Y$从$ESTATE|§Y$手里收回吗？

original: This will decrease their loyalty by $AMT|R$ (to $TOTAL$), influence by $INFLUENCE|Y$ (to $TOTAL2|Y$) and percentage of land by $TERRITORY|Y$ (to $TOTAL3|Y$).
translation: 这会降低他们$AMT|R$的忠诚 (变为$TOTAL$)，$INFLUENCE|Y$的影响力 (变为$TOTAL2|Y$) 和$TERRITORY|Y$的土地占有率(变为$TOTAL3|Y$)。

original: Enabling Manage Attitude allows you to decide your country's attitude towards §Y$COUNTRY$§!. If you do not have Manage Attitude enabled, your attitude will automatically be set.
translation: 开启态度管理能调整你对§Y$COUNTRY$§!的态度。如果你不开启态度管理，那你的态度会被自动设定。

original: §RYou cannot enable Manage Attitude for your subjects.§!
§RYou cannot enable Manage Attitude for your allies.§!
§RYou cannot enable Manage Attitude for your rivals.§!

Unchecking this box will prevent §Y$COUNTRY$§! from calling you into any of their offensive wars. However, doing so will also prevent the accumulation of any Favors and might end the alliance if they think they can manage without you.
translation: 取消选中此框将防止§Y$COUNTRY$§!把你拖入他发起的进攻战争之中。但是，这样一来你也无法累计对方的人情，并有可能导致对方发现不需要你后终止盟约。

original: §RYou need at least §Y$COST$§! Favors to increase §Y$COUNTRY_ADJ$§! Trust of §Y$PLAYER$§!!§!
translation: §R你至少需要§Y$COST$§!人情来提高§Y$COUNTRY_ADJ$§!对§Y$PLAYER$§!的信任度§!

original: §RYou must be allied with §Y$COUNTRY$§! to increase §Y$COUNTRY_ADJ$§! Trust of §Y$PLAYER$§!!§!
translation: §R你必须和§Y$COUNTRY$§!结盟来提高§Y$COUNTRY_ADJ$§!对§Y$PLAYER$§!的信任度!§!

original: §R$COUNTRY|Y$ already has the highest possible trust of $PLAYER|Y$.§!
Spend §Y$COST$§! Favors to increase §Y$COUNTRY_ADJ$§! Trust of §Y$PLAYER$§! by §Y$AMT$§!.
translation: 花费§Y$COST$§!人情来提高§Y$COUNTRY_ADJ$§!对§Y$PLAYER$§!的信任度§Y$AMT$§!点。

original: §RYou need at least §Y$COST$§! Favors with §Y$COUNTRY$§! to ask them to Prepare for War.§!
translation: §R你至少需要对 §Y$COUNTRY$§!有§Y$COST$§!点人情才能要求他们备战。§!

original: You cannot ask §R§Y$COUNTRY$§! to Prepare for War when they are already at war!§!
translation: §R你无法要求§Y$COUNTRY$§!备战，因为他们在战争中。§!

original: §R§Y$COUNTRY$§! is already Preparing for War at the request of $WHO|Y$.§!
§R§Y$COUNTRY$§! is Preparing for War at our request. They will not start any wars of their own and are more willing to join our wars until $DATE|Y$.§!
translation: §R§Y$COUNTRY$§!在我们的要求下已经开始备战。直到$DATE|Y$之前他们都不会自己发动战争并更愿意加入我们的战争。§!

original: §RYou must be allied with §Y$COUNTRY$§! to ask them to Prepare for War.§!
translation: §R你必须和§Y$COUNTRY$§!结盟才能提出要求让他们备战。§!

original: Spend §Y$COST$§! Favors to ask §Y$COUNTRY$§! to Prepare for War. They will avoid starting any wars of their own for $MONTHS|Y$ months and will be more likely to join offensive calls coming from us during that time.
translation: 花费§Y$COST$§!人情来让§Y$COUNTRY$§!备战。在$MONTHS|Y$月内，他们不会自己发动战争并更愿意加入我们的战争。

original: Setting your attitude to §YHostile§! shows that you consider §Y$COUNTRY$§! an enemy to be conquered. They will refuse almost all diplomatic proposals from you, your allies will consider this a sign that you are willing to join wars against them, and your subjects will fabricate claims on their provinces.
translation: 将你的态度设为§Y敌视§!，代表你把§Y$COUNTRY$§!当做将要征服的对象。他们会拒绝来自你的几乎所有的外交提案，你的盟友会认为你愿意加入对抗该国的战争，你的属国会开始伪造对该国省份的宣称。

original: Setting your attitude to §YNeutral§! shows that you do not consider §Y$COUNTRY$§! to be relevant to your interests. They will generally avoid interacting with you diplomatically, and your allies will view this as a sign that you are indifferent towards them.
translation: 将你的态度设为§Y中立§!，代表你认为§Y$COUNTRY$§!与你的利益没有关联。他们通常会避免与你进行外交活动，而你的盟友会认为你对该国漠不关心。

original: Setting your attitude to §YFriendly§! shows that you wish to ally yourself with §Y$COUNTRY$§!. Your allies will view this as a sign that you are unwilling to attack them.
translation: 将你的态度设定为§Y友善§!，代表你希望和§Y$COUNTRY$§!结盟。你的盟友会认为你没有攻打该国的意愿。

original: §RYou cannot set your attitude to §YFriendly§! because §Y$COUNTRY$§! does not hold least §Y$OPINION$§! opinion of §Y$PLAYER$§!.§!
translation: §R你无法将你的态度设为§Y友善§!，因为§Y$COUNTRY$§!对§Y$PLAYER$§!的好感度未达到§Y$OPINION$§!。§!

original: §RYou cannot set your attitude to §YThreatened§! because §Y$COUNTRY$§! is not at least §Y33%§! more powerful than §Y$PLAYER$§!.§!
translation: §R你无法将你的态度设为§Y畏戒§!，除非§Y$COUNTRY$§!国力超过§Y$PLAYER$§!至少§Y33%§!。§!

original: §RYou cannot set your attitude to §YThreatened§! because §Y$COUNTRY$§! is not in a position to threaten §Y$PLAYER$§!.§!
translation: §R你无法将你的态度设为§Y畏戒§!，因为§Y$COUNTRY$§!并未处在能威胁§Y$PLAYER$§!的位置上。§!

original: Setting your attitude to §YThreatened§! shows that you fear §Y$COUNTRY$§!. They will view this as a sign that you are willing to ally them for safety, but also that you are seeking other powerful allies to protect you against them.
translation: 将你的态度设为§Y畏戒§!，代表你畏惧§Y$COUNTRY$§!。他们会认为你愿意和他们结盟以求自保，但同时你也在寻找其他能与之对抗的强大盟友来保护你。

original: §YTrust§! is a measure of the strength of any alliance we have with §Y$COUNTRY$§!. It decreases if we break promises or otherwise act dishonorably towards them. It can be increased by spending Favors. Trust will also increase with time as long as you are allied or one is the subject of the other.
translation: §Y信任度§!是衡量我们和§Y$COUNTRY$§!联盟关系坚实程度的指标。如果我们背弃承诺或做出其他不名誉的事情，信任就会降低。你可以通过花费人情增加信任。当处于盟友或附庸关系时，信任会随着时间自动增加。

original: As we are allied to them, we will gain a Favor every $YEARS|Y$ year(s). The amount of years needed to gain a Favor depends on the relative strength of our country to theirs. We will gain our next favor by §YJanuary $YEAR$§!.
translation: 我们与他们同盟，每$YEARS|Y$年会获得1点人情。这个数值取决于两国之间的相对实力。下次我们将在§Y$YEAR$年1月§!获得1点人情。

original: As we are refusing to join their offensive wars, we will be unable to gain new Favors and existing Favors will decay over time.
translation: 因为我们拒绝参加他们的进攻战争，我们无法获得新的人情，已有的人情也会随时间消逝。

original: As we are not allied to them, we will be unable to gain new Favors and existing Favors will decay over time.
translation: 因为我们和他们不再是盟友，我们无法获得新的人情，已有的人情也会随时间消逝。

original: §YFavors§! is a measure of how much §Y$COUNTRY$§! owes us for good deeds we have done them in the past, such as helping them in their wars and giving them land they want in our own wars. It can be spent to increase their Trust towards us, ask them to Prepare for War with another country, or to call them into a war where we are not promising them any territorial gains.
translation: §Y人情§!是衡量§Y$COUNTRY$§!受到我们过去的帮助而亏欠我们多少的指标，例如帮他们打仗，给他们想要的土地。人情能用来增加信任，要求他们准备与另一个国家作战，或者要求他们参加一个我们的战争而不必承诺给予他们土地。

original: §Y$WHO$§! is given fewer provinces than they expect from their §Y$CONT$%§! War Contribution, reducing their Trust by §R$AMT$§!.
translation: 基于§Y$WHO$§!的§Y$CONT$%§!的战争贡献，他们认为给予其的省份低于预期，因此他们的信任降低了§R$AMT$§!。

original: \n\n$WHO|Y$ believes we can press them for a better deal.
translation: \n\n$WHO|Y$ 相信我们可以强迫他们获得更好的条件

original: §Y$WHO$§! is given more provinces than they expect from their §Y$CONT$%§! War Contribution, and will owe you §G$AMT$§! Favors.
translation: 基于§Y$WHO$§!的§Y$CONT$%§!的战争贡献，他们认为给予其的省份高于预期，因此他们将欠我们§G$AMT$§!人情。

original: Signing a separate peace will reduce §Y$WHO$§! Trust by §R$AMT$§!.
translation: 单独和敌人媾和会降低§Y$WHO$§!§R$AMT$§!信任度。

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§! has been promised territorial gains from this war. If you win the war and do not give them their fair share of the peace treaty, they will be very upset.
translation: §Y$COUNTRY$§!已经得到在这场战争中获得土地的承诺。如果赢得了战争而在和谈中却没有分配他们应得的土地，他们会非常生气。

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§! has not been promised territorial gains from this war. You will need to spend Favors to convince them to join.
translation: §Y$COUNTRY$§!没有得到在这场战争中获得土地的承诺。你需要花费人情说服他们在这场战争中加入你方。

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§! is not interested in any §Y$ADJ$§! land.
§GClick to change whether or not to promise this country territorial gains in the war.§!
translation: §G点击选择是否允诺该国从这场战争中获得土地。§!

original: $COUNTRY$ must own, control and have cored all $NUM$ provinces of $AREA|Y$ to gain and keep score. Currently have $CURRENT$.\n
translation: $COUNTRY$必须拥有、控制并核心化$AREA|Y$地区的所有$NUM$个省份才能获得并保持分数。地区的分数为$CURRENT$。\n

original: Enables or disables victory cards in the game.
Blocks certain destructive actions by players that have lost a war as long as the truces after that war are in effect.
translation: 在停战条约有效期间，防止战败方玩家的某些破坏性行为。

original: This game has victory cards enabled by the host. Starting from $START_YEAR|Y$, you may gain a victory card to conquer a specific area, and additional cards every $INTERVAL|Y$ years. Cards are only gained above $MIN_DEV|Y$ development.\n\nConquering all provinces in the area specified by a card provides a ticking bonus to your score which takes $SCORE_INCREASE|Y$ months to reach a maximum of $MAX_SCORE|Y$-$MAX_SCORE2|Y$. Should you lose any province in the area, score for the card ticks to zero in $SCORE_DECREASE|Y$ months.
translation: 这局游戏主机开启了胜利卡系统。从 $START_YEAR|Y$开始，你可以获得胜利卡来征服特定区域，并每$INTERVAL|Y$年获得额外卡片。只有当发展度超过$MIN_DEV|Y$才能获得卡片。\n\n征服卡片上的指定地区的所有省份，能在$SCORE_INCREASE|Y$月内增加最多$MAX_SCORE|Y$-$MAX_SCORE2|Y$的分数，如果失去其中任意省份，卡片的额外分数会在$SCORE_DECREASE|Y$内降低为零。

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§! views §Y$PROV$§! as a province of vital interest.
, and as a province of vital interest.
translation: ，并视为重大利益所在的省份。

original: Provinces of vital interest are considered part of a country's natural borders. They are likely to attack any country holding it, and unlikely to ally another country that is laying claim to it.
translation: 重大利益所在省份一般被认为是国家天然疆域的一部分。该国有很大可能会攻击持有那些省份的国家，并不太愿意与对这些省份拥有宣称的国家结盟。

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§! views §Y$PROV$§! as a province of strategic utility.
translation: §Y$COUNTRY$§!将§Y$PROV$§!视为具有战略意义的省份。

original: , and as a province of strategic utility.
Provinces of strategic utility are considered useful for a country to acquire. They are likely to take it in a war if given the chance, but will not care about other countries laying claim to it.
translation: 具有战略意义省份被一个国家认为是有征服价值的。如果有机会，该国有很大可能会发动战争征服这些省份，但并不在意其他国家也对该省份提出宣称。

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§! views §Y$PROV$§! as a part of their empire
§Y$COUNTRY$§! views §Y$PROV$§! as a part of their nation.
, but has no interest in it.
Provinces of no interest are not considered relevant to a country's expansion plans. They will refuse to take it in a war.
translation: 利益无关省份不会被纳入一个国家的扩张计划。他们不会接受这些省份作为战争的战利品。

original: §GClick to set this province as a province of vital interest.§!
translation: §G点击将该省份设为重大利益所在省份。§!

original: §GClick to set this province as no longer being a province of vital interest.§!
translation: §G点击将该省份设为非重大利益所在省份。§!

original: §RCannot set this province as a province of vital interest because a war ally has already claimed it.§!
translation: §R无法将该省份设为重大利益所在省份，因为一个并肩作战中的盟友已经宣称了该省份。§!

original: §RCannot set this province as a province of vital interest because a war ally owns it.§!
translation: §R无法将该省份设为重大利益所在省份，因为该省属于一个并肩作战中的盟友。§!

original: §Y$NAME$§! will be razed to the ground, lowering its Development level by §R$AMT$§!.\n\nThis will give you §G$ADM$§! £adm, §G$DIP$§! £dip, §G$MIL$§! £mil and §G$LOOT$§!¤ of loot, as well as $UNITY$ Horde Unity.
translation: §Y$NAME$§!将被夷为平地，发展度会降低§R$AMT$§!。\n\n你会得到§G$ADM$§!£adm£、§G$DIP$§!£dip£、§G$MIL$§!£mil£、§G$LOOT$§!¤和$UNITY$游牧团结。

original: Their relation with us will worsen by $OPINION$.
translation: 他们对我们的好感将降低$OPINION$。

original: §RWe will currently not get any power from razing due to:\n$MODIFIERDESC$§!
translation: §R我们暂时无法从焚掠中获得任何点数，原因如下：\n$MODIFIERDESC$§!

original: If we raze $NAME|Y$ at a later time, we will gain §G$ADM$§! £adm, §G$DIP$§! £dip, §G$MIL$§! £mil and §G$LOOT$§!¤ of loot, as well as $UNITY$ Horde Unity.
translation: 如果晚一些焚掠$NAME|Y$，我们会得到 §G$ADM$§! £adm 、§G$DIP$§! £dip 、§G$MIL$§! £mil 、§G$LOOT$§! ¤ 和$UNITY$游牧团结。

original: §ROnly non-core provinces that you own and control can be razed.§!
translation: §R只有你拥有并控制的非核心的省份才可以被焚掠。§!

original: §RThis province cannot be razed because its Development is too low.§!
translation: §R这个省份无法被焚掠因为其发展度太低了§!

original: §RThis province cannot be razed again until §Y$DATE$§!.§!
translation: §R这个省份无法被再次焚掠直到§Y$DATE$§!。§!

original: §RProvinces cannot be razed while under siege.§!
translation: §R处于围城战之下的省份无法被焚掠。§!

original: §RCan't raze a province that you have colonized.§!
Choose to have no Syncretic Faith
- Provinces of your Syncretic Faith are tolerated as if they were §Y$NAME$§!.\n- Countries following your Syncretic Faith will view you as though you were following that religion.
translation: －信仰你的相融信仰的省份会受到如同信仰§Y$NAME$§!一样的容忍。\n－那些信仰你的相融信仰的国家会以信仰同宗教国家的态度对待你。

original: As the influence of foreign religions grows in our society it has increasingly come to be in conflict with those who follow the old ways. Throughout our society the proponents of either faith are currently at odds, hurting the unity of our country.
translation: 随着外来宗教在我们的社会中产生影响，它已越来越多地与那些因循守旧的方式发生冲突。无论是哪一种信仰的支持者都无法容忍对方，这伤害了我们国家的团结.

original: The people of this province fear that our flirting with foreign religions will mean abandoning the religion of our forefathers.
translation: 这个省份的人担心与外来宗教眉来眼去意味着数典忘祖。

original: Recent events have made the faithful of this province doubt the sincerity of our leaders.
translation: 最近发生的事件使这个省的信徒怀疑我们领导者的虔诚。

original: Some of our warriors have begun to take to foreign religions and forget the martial culture and beliefs of their ancestors.
translation: 我们的勇士们有一些开始信奉外来的宗教，而忘却了军事传统与祖先的信仰。

original: A series of bad events has made life hard in this province. While we are sure that things are improving after our attempts to remedy this using the proper Tengri rituals it is clear that the locals have been less pleased by our efforts.
translation: 一系列不良事件使得这个省份的生活变得艰苦。虽然我们确信情况在我们举行了适当的长生天仪式进行补救后获得了改善。但很明显，当地人对我们的努力没有那么高兴。
萨满教的传统抛却一旁

original: Our Shamans are upset that they are losing ground to other religions in some parts of our realm.
translation: 我们的萨满们心烦意乱，因为在国内某些地方，人们正在改信其他宗教。

original: This province has seen an increase in religious migration, strengthening the local congregations and entrenching the local religion. This will likely make this province harder to convert even if the local religion should fall out of favor with our ruling elite.
translation: 这个省已经见证了宗教移民的增加，加强地方教会和巩固当地的宗教。这很可能会使这个省的宗教信仰更难改变，哪怕我们统治精英们对当地宗教不再偏爱。

original: A learned Qadi has settled in our capital, acting as a judge and arbiter in many matters he has facilitated the growth of central authority in our state. The traditionalists, however, view his presence as an affront to our old values and to the law codes of our ancestors.
translation: 一位博学的卡迪在我们的首都定居。通过在许多事情上担任法官和仲裁人，他促进了我们国家中央权力机构的发展。然而，传统主义者认为他的存在本身就是对我们的传统和祖宗之法的冒犯。

original: The concerned Muslims of our country have found it in themselves to trust our ruler after our adoption of much stricter Islamic rules for the life at court. This insistence on Muslim ritual and tradition has, however, made many of our more traditional subjects doubt our right to rule them.
translation: 我们在宫廷生活中实施了更加严厉的伊斯兰教条之后，国内忧心的穆斯林们对我们的统治者变得信任了。然而，这种对穆斯林仪式和传统的坚持使得我们许多更传统的臣民质疑我们的统治。
统治者受到地方当局质疑

original: Many of the inhabitants in this province find it hard to trust central authority and our ruler in particular.
translation: 这个省的许多居民发现很难信任中央政府，特别是统治者本人。

original: The spread of Islam among our warriors have left them with a newfound fervor in their struggle against our religious enemies.
translation: 伊斯兰教在我们战士中的传播，使他们在与我们的宗教敌人的斗争中获得新的激情。

original: A charismatic Sufi master has settled in our capital, enriching our faith and placing our country on the spiritual map.
translation: 一个有魅力的苏菲派长老已经在我们的首都定居，他将深化我们的信仰，让我国在精神世界的版图中也占据一席之地。

original: By ruling in favor of their rights we have strengthened the urban community in this region and as a result it is growing nicely. Their gratitude also ensures that they are much more forthcoming with their tax payments.
translation: 通过作出维护城镇居民权益的裁决，这个地区的城镇社区得到了加强，因而发展良好。当地人对我们的感激之情还确保他们更愿意支缴税金。

original: By ruling in favor of their rights we have strengthened our ties to the local warriors in this region and as a result they are more than willing to help us in the future.
translation: 通过维护宗族势力权益的裁决，我们加强了与该地域战士的联系，因此他们更愿意在将来帮助我们。

original: A large number of monks have settled in this area and have started to set up local religious institutions. As a result their faith is spreading in the province itself, a process that is not entirely without tensions between converts and traditionalists.
translation: 大量的僧侣在这一地区定居，并开始建立当地的宗教机构。因此他们的信仰在该省开始传播。而这个传教过程，和当地的传统并不是一直相安无事的。

original: A delegation of Buddhist monks have reached our lands from abroad in the hopes of spreading their religious philosophy among us. Their presence has in many ways influenced our court rituals and ceremonies, facilitating our contacts with other countries.
translation: 一个来自国外的佛教僧侣代表团来到了到我们的国家并且希望带在我们的国家传播他们的宗教哲学。他们的存在在许多方面都影响了我们的宫廷和宗教仪式并促进我们与其他国家的联系。

original: We are experiencing a fresh influx of ideas from returning nobles from Tibet and India. Their study of Buddhist ideals as well as their impressions of the societies there at large has led to numerous developments among our upper class.
translation: 我们正在经历着西藏和印度的贵族们的思想的渗透。他们对佛教理想的研究以及对社会的印象，在我们上层阶级中大量发展和传播。

original: The Confucian ideals that many of our nobles have taken a liking to have left them weak and disinterested in matters of war. Their ancestors fought from horseback but they prefer the brush to the bow.
translation: 儒家思想使得我们的许多贵族在战争问题上的软弱和自私当作家常便饭。他们的祖先从马上战斗，但他们却更喜欢去保养他们那些精美却不堪用的弓箭。

original: We have forbidden the use of Confucian titles and nomenclature among our nobility to continue to foster a strong martial ethos among our people. If this upsets a scribe or two that is the price we must pay for greatness.
translation: 我们禁止在我们的贵族中使用儒家的礼法，以继续培养我们民族中的强大的民族精神。如果我们不能做到这些，那么我们必然会为之付出代价。

original: Many of the nobles in our country have taken to the Confucian ideals and are spending their days educating themselves about how they may better themselves in their roles as representatives of the state.
translation: 我们国家的许多贵族都接纳了儒家的思想，他们现在整天都在自我学习关于如何更好地掌管国家

original: By keeping our Confucian elite separated from our traditionalist nobility we have alienated our administrators from our nobles. While this is both proper and well it has meant a certain distance between us and them.
translation: 在我们的贵族中，从我们的传统中脱离的儒家掌权者贵族开始逐步与我们的行政官僚疏远。虽然这是好事，但是它意味着我们和他们之间的距离。

original: By restraining our practice of the rituals of our ancestors we have further distanced ourselves from our roots and alienated those of our nobles that follow the traditional ways. Some would say we have sided with the men of the quill and forsaken our warriors.
translation: 通过抑制我们祖先的仪式，我们已经进一步疏远了我们的过去并且疏远那些传统贵族。但是有些人会说我们变得崇文抑武了。

original: Christian Missionaries have been granted the right spread their religion in this area.
translation: 基督教传教士已经被授予在这片土地上传教的权利。

original: We have brought a powerful wandering holy man to our court where he acts as our advisor on matters of religion and as the confessor of our ruler.
translation: 我们带来了一个伟大的流浪圣人到我们的宫廷，他作为我们的宗教事务顾问并且还作为我们的统治者的忏悔者。
对非基督徒的价值观颠覆

original: The people here are upset at what they see as the decadent Tengri or Syncretic rituals and customs practiced in our capital.
translation: 人们的不安是显而易见的，对于他们看到长生天传统的仪式的衰微和融合信仰的风俗习惯在我们的首都流行。

original: While the Tengri faith of our ancestors is still practiced by the many of the commoners in our country our ruler and his court uphold a strict set of Christian rules, facilitating negotiations with rulers abroad as well as easing tensions with the Christian population in many of our cities. Many view this break with tradition as the sign of a weak ruler however.
translation: 在我们的国家来自祖先的长生天信仰仍然受到许多平民的崇拜，但是我国的统治者和他的宫廷坚持一套严格的基督教统治者的规则，促进与国外统治者的交流以及缓解许多我们的城市中定居的基督教徒。然而许多人们认为打破传统是一个软弱统治者的标志。
长生天 - 印度教融合

original: As a result of the fusing of Tengri and Hindu customs we have become more adept at incorporating various parts of foreign religions in general. Some would say we are diluting the faith of our forefathers but right now we are seeing a lessening of tension in all places where we interact with people of foreign faiths.
translation: 由于对长生天和印度教习俗的融合，我们已经将外国宗教的各个部分习以为常的融入在我们之中。有些人会说我们是在背弃了祖先的信仰，但是现在我们看到的是一个在所有地方我们与外国人民的信仰和谐共存。

original: This province has seen a rise in Hindu migration as well as an increasing adoption of Hindu customs. Shamans and commoners alike have started to fit into the Hindu Caste system of the newcomers.
translation: 这个省在印度教的迁徙中发生了一次飞跃，并通过印度教的风俗。萨满变成了婆罗门，巫师和平民都已经开始融入新的种姓制度。

original: The Shamans of old and the Brahmin priests of the Hindus have little love for each other and are competing throughout our society for influence.
translation: 过去的老萨满和印度教婆罗门彼此之间没有任何好感，为了彼此的影响他们在社会的各个角落进行着竞争。

original: By supporting our Shamans when these have been in conflict with the Brahmin establishment we have angered the Hindu priests in our realm. This has led to their lacking cooperation and inciting of disobedience towards our rule.
translation: 由于我们在萨满与婆罗门之间的冲突中选择支持了萨满，我们已经激怒了我们国家的印度教徒。这导致了他们开始不与我们合作，并且他们开始被煽动起来。

original: Through our support for the Brahmin priests we have angered the Shamans of our empire who have now withdrawn from the court and city life in our state. Instead they have withdrawn to the countryside and act to incite disobedience towards the establishment.
translation: 由于我们在萨满和婆罗门之间的冲突中选择支持了婆罗门，被激怒了的萨满已经退出了我们的宫廷和城市间的生活。然而他们已经深入农村地区，并且在煽动当地民众与我们对抗。
神道教 - 长生天宫廷文化

original: By introducing Shinto customs such as the Japanese Tea Ceremony into our courtly culture we have managed to impress our neighbors and increase our understanding of negotiations in foreign cultures.
translation: 通过引入神道习俗如日本茶道到我们的宫廷文化中，我们已经增加了我们对外国文化的了解并且容易给我们的邻居谈判。

original: Spread of the Way of Tea

Shinto customs are spreading in our lands and especially in the cities under our control. Japanese artisans and traders are becoming an ever more frequent sight as our urban culture is becoming increasingly alike.
translation: 神道教的习俗正在我们的控制之下传播，尤其是在城市中。日本的匠人和商人正越来越频繁的出现在街道上，同时我们城市的文化也越来越与日本相近

original: The adoption of Japanese-style swords among our elite warriors have heightened the status of fighting on foot.
translation: 在我们的精英武士中开始采用日本式的刀剑，这提高了步兵的战斗能力。

original: Even though the Shinto warrior culture has spread into our lands to some degree we have taken a policy of limiting its influence by making sure all our warriors are still trained in the old traditions.
translation: 尽管日本的武士文化已经蔓延到我们的土地，但是在某种程度上我们已经采取了限制其影响的措施，从而确保我们的战士仍然在旧的传统的培训政策。

original: This region is home to a growing monastic order which is putting some previously unused land to more productive use.
translation: 这个区域是一个日益发展的寺院地区，把一些以前未使用的土地更有效的利用

original: Thanks to the work of Theravada Monks we currently have a structured collection of rulings to help us with future legal cases. This will allow our judges to rule fairly and consistently all over the lands we control. As new rulings accumulate it is probable that a new collection will have to be made in the future.
translation: 归功于上座部佛教僧侣帮助我们完成了对以往案件裁定的收集汇编的工作，这可以帮助我们判决未来的法律案件。它将能够让我们的法官更加公平公正的进行裁决。随着新的法律的积累，在未来也许会再来一次汇编工作。

original: We have defended the traditional laws of our people, choosing to keep the old Yassa traditions of Genghis Khan in favor of foreign, and possibly more consistent, legal codes. For this the warrior elites of our society respect us.
translation: 我们保卫了我们的人民的传统法律，选择了维持老的大札撒法典的传统，这是成吉思汗的意志，更符合我们的传统。对于我们这个勇士的社会，他们会尊重我们。

original: A stream of followers of the Shiite faith have come to our lands hoping to realize their dream of a state matching their ideals. Their willingness to protect their new homes has created a good recruiting base for our armies.
translation: 一群什叶派信徒来到我们的国家，并且他们希望根据他们自己的意愿来获得一块定居地。他们对于保护自己新家园的愿望，使得这个定居地成了我们的一个新的兵源地。

original: We have allowed Shiite minorities from other countries that come to our lands seeking to start a new life here to settle in and around our capital. Our capital is growing as a result but Tengri Shamans and traditionalist fear their influence over our politics.
translation: 我们允许来自其他国家的什叶派信徒来到我们首都周边的土地谋生，以此来保卫我们的首都。我们的首都因此而壮大，但长生天萨满和传统主义者担心他们在我们政治活动中的影响力。

original: Our ruler has the support of the current descendant of the line of powerful Sufi Khojas that hold great influence in our lands.
translation: 我们的统治者有着强大的苏菲阿訇后裔的支持，这使得在我们的国家具有重要影响力的他们成为统治者的后台。

original: Zoroastrian traders have come to dominate the everyday life in many of our cities.
translation: 祆教商人已经在我国的许多城市主导日常生活。

original: By supporting the Ibadi scholarly community and attempting to live up to their ideas of leadership and righteousness we have managed to increase our support for our ruler.
translation: 通过支持伊巴德派学术界和并且接受他们对于领袖和正义的观念，以此来为我们的统治寻求更多的支持。

original: Our acceptance of widely different deities into our own Pantheon has led to a general tolerance and fusing of religious traditions. As a result we have fewer problems in general with religious conflicts in our lands.
translation: 我们将广泛的不同的神接受到我们自己的万神殿，这导致宽容和宗教文化的融合。结果就是我们的土地上宗教冲突之类的问题非常少。

original: Over time the influence of the Khoja and his descendants has grown dangerously strong in our country. Now that they do not have the ear of our ruler we can forcibly expel them from our lands, avoiding future conflicts.
translation: 随着时间的推移，阿訇和他的后代的影响已在我国变得过分强大。但现在，他们依然未能完全左右我们的统治者，我们可以强行将他们逐出我们的土地，避免未来的冲突。

original: In order to find talented teachers for our cadre of administrators we are recruiting those that have failed the imperial examinations in neighboring areas.
translation: 为了给我们的官员寻找能干的幕僚，我们正在招募附近那些科举落榜的人。

original: Conflicts between Shamans and the Clergy

The clergy of the [Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName] faith has been unusually uncooperative lately. They fear that we merely profess to be interested in their religion for personal gain and that we are not ready to fully embrace, patronize and spread its teachings. Likewise the Tengri Shamans have become more and more irritated at our apparent desire for foreign spiritual guidance.
translation: [Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName]的牧师最近一直非常不合作。他们害怕我们只是为了个人利益而自称对他们的宗教感兴趣而非全心皈依、支持并传播其教义。同样，萨满还对我们寻求外神的指引而越来越不满。

original: Let them handle this without our intervention.

Some parts of our society have been more willing than others to embrace the [Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName] faith. It has, however, gained great popularity among our administrators and as they look abroad for spiritual inspiration they have also come to pick up a thing or two about statecraft.
translation: 我们社会的某些部分比其他人更愿意接受[Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName]信仰。它在我们的官僚中大受欢迎并且他们在国外寻找精神上的启示。他们也会从中学习一两件有关治国的方略。

original: Warriors Losing Touch with their Heritage

While some would question their sincerity many of our warriors have come to cherish the ideals of the [Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName] faith as promoted by our state. While they undoubtedly consider this to have enriched their spiritual life commanders fear that they are losing touch with the old ideals and morals of our ancestors.
translation: 虽然有些人会质疑他们的诚意，但我们的勇士们都是在我们国家所提倡的[Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName]信念的理想中的。他们毫无疑问地认为这是丰富了他们的精神生活，但是指挥官们担心他们会失去与我们祖先的旧的理想和道德的联系。

original: By patronizing the [Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName] faith we have come to develop closer ties to some of our neighbors. Our leaders may not always agree on everything but our religious institutions now have a great deal in common and some of our nobles intermingle while on religious pilgrimages.
translation: 通过选择[Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName]信仰我们同我们的邻居建立起了更紧密的联系。然而我们的宗教机构在宗教朝圣中和贵族拥有共同的特权却不是我们的领导者同意的。

original: A local crisis is underway in an area under our control. A number of minor problems have together come to cause calamity, famine and destruction of property. The population of the area are not followers of the Tengri ways and have implored us to handle the catastrophe according to the new traditions of our state. Our court Shamans have, however, quickly taken the position that they must be allowed to remedy the situation. There seems to be no solution that will placate both groups.
translation: 在在我们控制下的该地区，当地的危机正在发生。一些小问题一起引起灾难，饥荒和财产的破坏。这个地区的人民并不是长生天传统的追随者，并且他们恳求我们按照我们国家的新方式处理灾难。我国宫廷的萨满却认为应该采取的立场是，他们必须允许亡羊补牢。似乎没有办法能够解决两方的对立。

original: Send the Shamans to restore peace.

translation: 赋予当地神职人员权力

original: Having learned of our patronization of their faith a great number of adherents have traveled to our lands to help spread the good word and to settle and make a life for themselves within our borders.
translation: 在我们的庇护下，这些人的信仰得到了保护，许多信徒来到了我们的国家传播他们的信仰，同时他们在这里定居并开始他们的新生活。

original: Encourage them to settle among their peers.
translation: 鼓励他们在他们的同等人中定居

original: Send them out into the provinces.

It seems the proponents of our syncretic faith have lost no time proselytizing among our people. The people of [Root.GetName] have come to increasingly abandon the customs of their ancestors and adopt the ways taught by the many priests we have invited to our country.
translation: 看来我们的宗教信仰支持者已不存在于在我们的人民之中。[Root.GetName]的人民已经逐渐放弃他们祖先的习俗和采用我们邀请来的牧师教导的方式。

original: In time the faith of our ancestors has become a much more marginalized part of our society. The [Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName] faith on the other hand is patronized by our rulers, propagated for by most of the priests in our society and in general much more dominant. Perhaps it is time to finally do away with the Shamanic rituals of those that came before us and fully embrace the religion of most of our current subjects.
translation: 经过一段时间之后，我们的祖先的信仰已经成为我们社会中更为边缘化的一部分。另一方面，[Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName]信仰偶依赖着我们统治者的恩惠，大多数的牧师在我们的社会更占主导地位。或许是时候摆脱那些传统的萨满，投入我们新信仰的怀抱中去了。

original: The Ibadi community of [Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName] is home to many religious scholars, men of learning who interpret the holy texts and the ways they can be used to rule fairly and righteously in legal matters. Due to the great influence of the Ibadis in our society at large the results of these scholars are starting to spread throughout our country and have a profound effect on the view of rulership and righteousness.
translation: 在[Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]的伊巴德派社区是许多宗教人士的家，有学识的人来这里解释经文，它们可用于公平公正规则在法律问题上的行使方式。由于这些学者在我们的社会中的巨大影响，伊巴德开始在我国传播，对统治和道德观产生了深远的影响。

original: We must live up to these ideals!
translation: 我们必须达到这些理想！

original: Opening up our country to the influences of Islam has attracted a trickle of persons from the wider Muslim world. Muslim merchants now make deeper inroads into the countryside of our and traveling Sufis have become a more common sight among our settlements. At times it is possible to track the path of such holy men by the converts they leave behind as they move from one area to the next. Some of these men are already famous when they come to our lands and possess a way to mobilize the heart and will of men to follow a ruler they see as just.\nOne particularly famous Sufi teacher has recently arrived in our lands.
translation: 开放我国对伊斯兰教的影响，吸引了来自更广泛的穆斯林世界的一些人。穆斯林商人现在更深入的旅行到苏菲派农村，这已在我们的移民中习以为常。有时，当他们从一个区域转移去到下一个区域的时候，可以跟踪这些神圣之人的道路。这些人中有一些注明的人来到我们的国家，他们将有方法调动人心然后使其跟随统治者。而一个特别著名苏菲派教师最近正好来到我们的土地。

original: Encourage him to settle in our capital.
translation: 鼓励他在我们的首都定居。

original: Encourage him to seek a patron elsewhere.
translation: 鼓励他在别处寻找一位顾客。
一个博学的法官的到来

original: A man with extensive experience as a judge in other Muslim countries has arrived in our lands. He says that he is willing to settle in our lands for a while and act his old profession, dispensing justice according to the Sharia, ensuring law and order in our lands. This would no doubt be popular, especially among the Muslim community in our country. His experience in other countries might also help centralize our realm.
translation: 一名具有广泛经验的穆斯林国家法官已经到达了我们的国家。他说他愿意接受我们的国家，作为他的老本行，根据伊斯兰教法弘扬公平正义，确保法律和秩序。这无疑将是受欢迎的的，特别是在我们国家的穆斯林社区。他在其他国家的经验也可能有助于集中我们的水平和能力。

original: Everyone must follow the laws of our ancestors.
translation: 每个人都必须遵循我们祖先的规律

original: Our adoption of Islam has not been without friction. While its favored status has made the Muslim community grow in our lands many remain uneasy with their one god. [Root.Monarch.GetName] has [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] shown great interest in the foreign religion but still practices many of the rituals of our ancestors. Perhaps it is because [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] takes such interest in them that the Muslim community itself has come to scrutinize the life and actions of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. The Muslim community leaders question whether [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] decisions are really made with the best interests of them and their god in mind.
translation: 我们采用伊斯兰教一直没有缺少过摩擦。虽然它的最惠国地位已经让穆斯林社区在我们的国家蔓延，许多人仍然对他们的一神论感到不安。[Root.Monarch.GetName]对于国外的宗教仪式充满着兴趣，但是仍然在实行着祖先所创制的仪式。也许是因为[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]对它们有着如此的兴趣，穆斯林社区以他们自己的方式来审视我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的方式和行为。穆斯林社区领袖的问题是，是否[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的决定是否真的是能够满足他们的最大利益和心中的主。

original: Vow to lead a more devout life.
translation: 发誓要过一个更虔诚的生活
我们的[Root.Religion.GetName]传统才是第一位

original: Every province following our §YSyncretic§! Faith will suffer §R5§! unrest for §Y10§! years.
translation: 每个信奉我们的§Y相融§!信仰的省份§Y10§!年内将受到§R5§!叛乱风险。

original: In an unfortunate gaffe our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has managed to upset the Muslim community of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] by including their leaders in a [Root.Religion.GetName] ceremony. While this act was intended entirely as an honor it has resulted in some very sore feelings among the Muslims in our capital and elsewhere.
translation: 在一个不幸的事件中，我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]在一次宫廷骚乱中破坏了[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的穆斯林社区，包括他们领导者的[Root.Religion.GetName]典礼。虽然这一行为的目的是荣耀的，但是在我们的首都和其他地方的穆斯林却产生了负面的情绪。

original: Our country is in some ways at the frontier of the Islamic world and as such mostly attracts the attention of traveling Sufis or merchants. It seems, however, that a fervent preacher has managed to convince a large group of warriors to submit to this foreign god and these men are now taking part in our current wars against their religious enemies with a newfound fervor.
translation: 我们的国家在处于伊斯兰世界的边境，因此吸引到了旅游的苏菲派学者或商人的注意。然而，一个狂热的牧师已经成功地说服了一大群战士服从于国外的一神论，而这些人现在正以一种新的激情去对抗他们的宗教敌人。

original: With the increasing influence of Islam, especially in our growing cities, the older legal codes such as the Yassa have increasingly come to be abandoned in favor of the Sharia that our Muslim urban dwellers prefer.\nThis development has recently resulted in a heated legal battle in [Root.GetName] where an important warrior from a local clan is insisting on his rights according to tradition while the urban establishment is insisting on following the Sharia. Supporting one side over the other will undoubtedly have repercussions for the development of the entire area.
translation: 伊斯兰教的影响越来越大，尤其是在我们日渐增大的城市，旧的法律法规比如札撒已经越来越多地被遗弃，而伊斯兰教法则更受到穆斯林城市居民的青睐。这种发展导致近期激烈的法律斗争，在[Root.GetName]，一个地方宗族的重要人物根据传统坚持自己的权利，而城市方面坚持以伊斯兰教法。支持某一方对整个地区的发展无疑会产生影响。

original: Appoint a Muslim judge to the case.
Appoint someone to judge according to our traditions.
translation: 根据我们的传统任命一个人来判断
广受欢迎的苏菲派老师

original: A teacher of a lineage of famous Sufis has recently gained increasing popularity in our lands. His teachings have not only won the ears of our Muslim communities but also have deeply impressed the more traditional warrior elites. Many that listen to his words will still not forsake the Tengri Shamans but the teacher's charismatic personality ensures that even so they will value every word of this 'Khoja'. A local noble that managed to come into conflict with the Khoja lost so badly he had to abandon his lands.\nSo far the Khoja have been quietly supporting our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], perhaps he could be persuaded to support the throne a bit more openly if we grant him land and an official title at our court?
translation: 在我们的国家，一个著名苏菲派老师最近得到越来越多的普遍欢迎。他的教导，不仅赢得了我们的穆斯林社区的耳朵，但也深深打动了更多传统的战士精英。很多聆听他的教诲的人们即使不愿意放弃长生天萨满的信仰，但是教师的人格魅力仍然使他们重视他说的每一个字，来自这个「阿訇」。一个卷入和他冲突的贵族失去了自己所有的土地。\n目前阿訇一直默默支持我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，也许他能被说服支持王位以获得更公开的官方头衔，如果我们授予他土地和我们的宫廷职位的话。

original: Every future ruler will be offered this modifier but the Khoja or his descendants may well try to take power themselves eventually.
translation: 每一个未来的统治者将增加阿訇的权力，但是阿訇或他的后裔最终可能试图把持权力

original: The Khoja and his descendants will not bother us again.
translation: 阿訇和他的后代不会打扰我们

original: The power of the Khoja lineage over our subjects is almost too great. They are constantly meddling in legal cases, religious policy and the day-to-day business of our country. The Khoja is, however, still one of the most valiant supporters of the throne. With the crowning of [Root.Monarch.GetName] we will be expected to affirm the ties to the Khoja and perhaps extend his privileges even further.
translation: 阿訇家族血统者的力量是太强大了在我们的国家，他们不断干涉法律案件，宗教政策和我们国家的日常事物。然而阿訇仍然是王位最重要也是最勇敢的支持者，随着至高无上的[Root.Monarch.GetName]加冕。在未来我们期望[Root.Monarch.GetName]与阿訇建立更紧密的联系，甚至更进一步延长他的特权。
他仍然是我们最坚定的支持者

original: This will strengthen the Khoja and increase the likeliness of him or his successors attempting to take power in the future.
translation: 这将加强阿訇或他的继任者在未来试图取得权力的成功率

original: Attempt to limit the influence of the Khojas.
translation: 试图限制的阿訇的影响

original: This will weaken the influence of the Khojas and their chances to take power in the future.
translation: 这将削弱阿訇的影响并减少未来他们取得权力的几率

original: Not content to continue to serve as the power behind the throne the current head of the Khoja lineage has today declared himself to be more fit to rule than any [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. His followers are massing on the outskirts of our capital as well as in the countryside attempting to create a state built directly upon the teachings of their charismatic Sufi teacher.
translation: 不满足继续充当幕后掌权人的阿訇家族今天宣布自己更适合比[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]统治。他的追随者是集结我们的首都郊区的农村以及试图创建一个状态直接建在他们充满魅力的苏菲派阿訇的教诲之上的国家。

original: While there is ample doubt about the sincerity of our conviction word of our conversion has spread among the Shiite communities around the world. Small groups of Shiites have begun to arrive in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] seeking to help build and protect a state for those that honor the Imams.\nTheir services might come in quite handy but our Shamans are apprehensive about allowing what they see as foreign zealots to settle among our people.
translation: 虽然世界各地的什叶派社区对于我们转换信仰的诚意有充份怀疑，但是小团体的什叶派开始抵达[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]寻求一个国家帮助建立和保护纪念那些伊玛目。他们的服务可能会派上大用场，但是我们萨满是担心允许他们进入是让外国狂热者定居在我们的人民中。

original: A large delegation of Vajrayana Monks have arrived in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] today. Having learned of the interest we are taking in their faith they are eager to explain it not only to our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] but to our many subjects.
translation: 藏传佛教的僧侣代表团今天抵达了我们的首都[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]，在得知了我们对于他们信仰的兴趣后，他们希望不仅仅是向我们的君主 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] ，也向那些感兴趣的普通民众解释他们的信仰

original: Increases the chances of conversion to Vajrayana in provinces with the §YInflux of Monks§! modifier.
translation: 在这个省份提升金刚乘佛教的传教机会通过§YInflux of Monks§! 修正.

original: Increases the chances of conversions to Vajrayana in all our provinces.
translation: 在我们的所有省份提升金刚乘佛教的传教机会
宗教典籍被翻译为[Root.Culture.GetName]的文字

original: In their desire to spread their faith and incorporate the [Root.GetName] realm into the wider Buddhist world some monks have taken it upon themselves to translate many Buddhist historical, philosophical and religious works for the benefit of our people. These manuscripts have opened the eyes of many to a new spiritual world as well as given us a better understanding of the surrounding world in general. Among the nobility collecting these manuscripts has become fashionable, though some would say not always for spiritual reasons.
translation: 为了他们的愿望，即传播他们的信仰和把[Root.GetName]纳入广泛的佛教世界，一些僧侣已经采取了行动它，翻译了许多佛教的历史，哲学和宗教的作品，这有益于我们的人民。这些手稿已经打开了许多人的眼睛，给予了他们一个新的精神世界，并给予我们更好地了解周围世界的机会。在贵族中收集这些手稿已经成为一种时尚，虽然有些人会说并非总是为精神方面的原因。

original: Welcome the dissemination of these books.
We must honor our ancient traditions instead.
translation: 我们必须尊重我们古老的传统

original: Strange tales are reaching us from the provinces of a traveling Buddhist Monk using his wisdom to overcome various problems and spreading his faith among the many people benefiting from his help. Not everyone is happy with these advances among the common people, however, as they often involve defeating the local Shamans.\nIn [Root.GetName] this monk reportedly defeated a local Shaman and cured a local princess from a severe malady, leaving the traditional rituals appearing poor and insufficient. As a result the local lord has banned traditional rituals in his lands and is instead promoting [Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName].
translation: 一些奇闻传到我们这里来，据说一位云游僧侣用他的智慧来克服各种问题并向那些受他帮助的人传播他的信仰。不是每个人都喜欢这些进步，其中常见的人不过是他们经常击败反日当地萨满。据说在[Root.GetName]这个和尚击败了当地的萨满,治愈当地公主的严重疾病，使传统的仪式暴露出了。由于当地领主已经在他的土地上禁止传统仪式，而是促进[Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName]的传播。

original: For some time Vajrayana monks have been gaining followers in the province of [Root.GetName] and while their influence is still quite limited they have apparently taken it upon themselves to go one step further in their missionary activity. Reports are reaching [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] of the destruction and incineration of our ancestral idols. The general reception of this policy has not turned out as the monks would have hoped, however, as the locals are now defending themselves from both the monks and the central authority that favors them.
translation: 这段时间内藏传佛教僧侣在[Root.GetName]省份获得了大量的追随者，但是他们的影响力仍然有限。显然，他们已经采取了更进一步的新的传教措施，即毁灭并焚烧我们祖先的偶像，这个消息已经传到了[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]。这一策略并没有像僧侣们预期的那样受到当地人的普遍欢迎，当地人现在希望免受僧侣们的威胁，请求中央权威保护自己。

original: It has become customary among our nobles to travel to the holy places of Vajrayana Buddhism in Tibet and India to study and learn of the Buddhist faith. As they return bringing new customs and perspectives to our country our society is slowly changing. This is not always a process without problems but recently we have been seeing some very positive trends in our government as a result of this exchange.
translation: 我们的贵族前往藏传佛教在西藏和印度佛教信仰的圣地进行研究和学习已经十分普遍，当他们返回带来新的习俗和新的社会视角正在对我国慢慢产生影响，这并不总是一个没有问题的过程，但最近我们已经看到了一些非常积极的趋势伴随着这种交流出现在我国的政府中。

original: With the increasing influence of the [Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName] faith in our country a number of new monasteries have been founded in our country. Their purpose is both to harbor the [Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName] monks that have come to our lands and the slowly growing number of native [Root.GetAdjective] monks.\nTraditional landholders don't seem to be very impressed by the pretensions of these newcomers, however, and have been helping themselves to the lands reserved for the monks. The monks claim that the land would be made more productive under their control while the land holders feel they are demanding the right to what is already theirs.
translation: 随着在我国[Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName]信仰影响的日益增强，一些新的宗教寺院已经建立在我国。[Root.SecondaryReligion.GetName]僧侣来到我们的土地和本土，他们的目的是庇护那些进入我国传教的外国僧侣以及不断增多的本地[Root.GetAdjective]僧侣。\n传统的地主并不对这些新来者的装腔作势感兴趣，但是他们帮助他们在这片土地上定局。然而僧侣们声称，土地将在他们的控制下取得更高的生产效率，而土地所有者认为他们要求的是他们已经拥有的土地的权利。
我们必须支持这些命令

original: We must protect the traditional rights of our people.
translation: 我们必须保护人民的传统权利

original: With Theravada Buddhism comes an ancient legal tradition based on old Pali scriptures as well as the collected rulings of many judges and monarchs before up to this day. Some Theravada monks have found our lack of collected written rulings very disturbing and have sought our blessings to create a collection of up-to-date rulings that, together with the Pali Canon, could serve as a basis for future rulings in our country.
translation: 伴随着上座部佛教发展，一种古老的法律传统也随之发展，这种传统基于老巴利语经文以及从古至今被收集的许多法官和君主的裁决。一些上座部僧人发现我们收集的法律文献存在令人不安的不足。他们寻求我们的支持创建一组最新的符合巴利文献的法律，这可以作为我国未来的裁决的依据。

original: The Yassa is enough for us.
translation: 大札撒（成吉思汗法典）对于我们来说足够了

original: By adopting the Mahayana faith we have opened our borders to a wide range of traditions and teachings but none seem to have attracted as many followers as the promises of the 'Pure Land' movement has. Throughout [Root.GetName] subjects immersed in meditation and recitation have become an increasingly common sight.
translation: 采用大乘佛教信仰后我们允许一系列广泛的传统和教义在国界内传播，但似乎没有一个能够像「净土」运动那样吸引了许多那么多的追随者。遍及 [Root.GetName]各处，人们沉浸在冥想与背诵中中已成为越来越普遍的景象。

original: Impressed by the refined and well-argued tenets of Confucianism many of our nobles have begun to strive to improve themselves through rigorous study and hard work. As a result we are not only becoming better at understanding the wider Confucian world but the administration of our land and resources has notably improved and above all become more consistent.
translation: 儒家思想的精炼和独特的理念给我们的贵族们留下了深刻的印象，贵族们开始通过严格的学习和努力来提高自己的工作水平。因此，我们不仅更广泛地了解了儒家思想并且我们对于国家和资源的管理出现了明显的改善，更重要的是，整个国家变得更加协调一致。

original: We can use this to purge corruption.
translation: 我们可以用它来清除腐败。

original: Let us encourage them to develop the land itself.
translation: 让我们支持他们去发展国家

original: As the learned ideals of Confucian philosophy gain more and more ground among the [Root.GetAdjective] nobility [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been beset by fears that our old ways are being forgotten. Many high ranking [Root.GetAdjective] dignitaries have taken to using foreign titles and names rather than the [Root.Culture.GetName] titles of our ancestors. Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] worries that in a generation none will remember the old ways of the bow and horse and our nation will be one of weak scribes and poets.
translation: 通过对儒学思想的研究学习，[Root.GetAdjective]贵族们掌握了更好的管理方式。[Root.Monarch.GetName]却被恐惧所困扰着，因为旧的思想正在被遗忘。的确，许多高级的[Root.GetAdjective]高官都开始使用外国的头衔和名字，而不是我们的祖先[Root.Culture.GetName]的名称。我们的君主担心，在一代或两代后，没有人会记得那些有关于弓和马的古老的思想，我们的国家只剩下了一群软弱的文人精英

original: No nation that has abandoned its own language can prosper!
translation: 没有放弃自己语言的国家才可以真正繁荣！

original: We have no reason to fear the Confucian Way.
translation: 我们没有理由害怕儒家的思想。

original: Participation in many traditional rituals is reserved for our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and those closest to [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]. While this means the Confucian elite of our country cannot take part this has not often been a problem as they view such 'superstitious' rituals and sacrifices with at best mild displeasure. This insistence to keep our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and his closest from the old [Root.Religion.GetName] elites separate from our other subjects has, however, led to an unnecessarily sharp divide between the two groups. This, rather than the rituals themselves, seems to be a constant source of irritation and misunderstandings, even at the very top of our society.
translation: 许多传统仪式是由我们的君主 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]和那些最亲近 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]的人主持参加的。然而这意味着我国的那些儒家掌权者绝对不会参与这些，这并不一定会产生问题，虽然他们认为这样的仪式是迷信的，而且对于牺牲祭品表示了最为轻微的不满。这种不一致会使我们的君主[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]和他那些来自旧的[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰的亲信们与我们其他的国民被区分开，而且这会不必要地导致两个群体之间剧烈的分歧。而这一点相比于那些仪式本身，似乎才是人们之间愤怒和误解的真正来源，即使在我们这个社会的最顶端阶层

original: Let us device common rituals instead.
translation: 让我们共同的仪式来代替。

original: Those around [Root.Heir.GetName] agree that the child is showing promise beyond what was initially expected. [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] is learning quickly and [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] skills are improving by the day.\nTraditionally the heirs of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] should spend their young years learning how to ride and shoot as the [Root.Culture.GetName] warriors of our past. This might not be the best way to take care of the growing abilities of [Root.Heir.GetName] however. Given the opportunity Confucian teachers promise to teach our heir how to better [Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself] and more importantly how to rule and make the most of our land and its subjects.
translation: 那些在[Root.Heir.GetName]周围的人认同这个孩子展现的前途是超出最初的预期的.[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]学习非常迅速并且[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]能力每天都在提高.按照传统[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的继承人要利用自己的年轻岁月学习如何骑射变成一个[Root.Culture.GetName]勇士. 然而这可能不是最好的用来培养[Root.Heir.GetName]日益增长的能力的方式。现在有一个机会，儒家教师承诺教我们的继承人[Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself]如何变得更好，更重要的是如何统治和使用我们的土地与臣民

original: A traditional education is the only way.
translation: 传统教育是仅有的道路.

original: We have no extra resources to spare for [Root.Heir.GetHerHim].
translation: 我们没有额外的资源来给[Root.Heir.GetHerHim].

original: The elaborate Tea Ceremonies that are common in many Shinto lands have spread far further than the Shinto religion itself and are becoming commonplace in most [Root.GetAdjective] cities as well as among the members of our court.
translation: 精心设计的茶道在神道教的国家是司空见惯的，而且比神道宗教本身流传的更远。无论是在多数的[Root.GetAdjective]城市中还是我们的宫廷人员外中都广为流传。

original: The Chinese have long felt that a good way to ensure efficient administration according to Confucian ideals is to hold general examinations for all administrators. This works well for a country with generations of experience to draw upon, something we do not have.\nThe current lack of both administrators and teachers might be remedied by attracting some of those that have failed the examinations in neighboring countries but we would be paying a high price for an uncertain commodity.
translation: 中国人很早就认为，根据儒教思想要保证有效率的行政管理，就必须要对所有行政人员进行全面的考核。这是一个代代相传的国家对于以往经验的总结，也是我们不曾拥有的东西。空缺的官职和教师位置可能会吸引很多邻国的失败者，但我们可能会为一个不确定的未来付出高昂的代价。

original: It is a risk we must take.
Let us seek talent among our own instead.
translation: 让我们在自己中间寻找人才.

original: Our courtly culture will never be the same.
translation: 我们的宫廷文化将永远不变.

original: Encourage the spread of the Way of Tea.

The Shinto view of failure is somewhat different from that of our Tengri traditions. As Shinto values become an increasingly important part of our society the expectations on our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] change.\nSome actions of [Root.Monarch.GetName] have come to be interpreted as lacking in both honor and ability by those who follow the syncretic mix of Shinto and Tengri customs that has come to take shape in our lands.
translation: 那些来自失败者们的神道教看起来和我们的长生天习俗有所不同。当神道教的价值传统在我们的社会影响越来越大时，人们对我们的君主[Root.Monarch.GetName]抱有更大的期望。\n但是[Root.Monarch.GetName]已经被发现没有足够的能力来将神道教和长生天习俗在我们的国土上融合.

original: The Shamans say I cannot be faulted.
translation: 萨满们说没人能指责我

original: Opening up our realm to Shinto customs and culture have also resulted in an increasing migration of Shinto practitioners into our lands, among them a number of Japanese weaponsmiths. The Swords they produce have become increasingly popular with the richer parts of our society and Japanese smiths are becoming common in most of our cities. Many of our elite warriors have begun to train with these weapons.\nSome worry that this will mean the abandonment of the Martial traditions of our ancestors though even those that cling to the old ways have benefited from a greater understanding of foreign fighting techniques.
translation: 自我们皈依神道信仰后，许多神道信徒自东洋而来到我国定居。他们也带来了许多其他的东西，例如东洋锻冶法。贵族阶层开始对这些东洋武器产生极大的兴趣，甚至有些人都开始用它进行军事训练，在绝大多数的城市里这一现象很普遍。\n部分大臣担心这将使我们遗忘祖先的军事传统。但即使是那些最顽固的守旧派，都从这一军事改革中获益匪浅。

original: Encourage our elites to use these swords.
Bow and arrow is for the true Tengri warrior.
translation: 我国家以骑射为业，今若轻循东洋之俗，不亲弓矢，则武备何由而习乎？

original: Used to acting far away from the Patriarch of their church the Coptic Monastic Orders have quickly made themselves at home in our lands. They are now growing in numbers and influence, especially in the frontier regions under our control. Under ideal circumstances the orders stand ready to move into a newly conquered region, establishing new monasteries, quickly stabilizing and converting the region to their faith. Our Shamans are alarmed at this practice as they feel they should be the ones to welcome our new subjects rather than these foreign Monks.
translation: 由于距离牧首圣座十分遥远，科普特正教的各修士会早已习惯了自主行事，他们很快就融入了我们的社会中。每当我国疆域拓张，他们总是早早跟进、设立教会并播撒福音。基督的道也因此得以迅速传播。萨满们注意到这一现象后，登时哗然——他们自认为自己才是这个国家的信仰主导者，新的国民应该皈依长生天，哪轮的上这些外来者当话事人。

original: We must promote our Tengri Shamans!

An official Papal embassy has arrived in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] seeking audience with [Root.Monarch.GetName]. The task of the envoys is to judge the sincerity of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], to once again hear him accept the pope as the head of the church and to include [Root.Monarch.GetName] into the wider Catholic community.\nIn order to achieve this the envoys have brought with them a number of books, maps and learned men. Surely these men are also spies, eager to learn our secrets. It is also certain that our Shamans will disagree with any policy of bowing to a foreign head of religion and refusing them an audience would please them. But perhaps the knowledge these Catholics bring can make up for missing that opportunity.
translation: 教廷大使团奉教宗之命，不远万里自圣座跋山涉水而来寻求。其主要目的，便是对我国进行考核，以决定是否将我国纳为教区，进而与西欧国家享有同等权益。我们的王[Root.Monarch.GetName]需宣誓，尊教宗为教会的首领，这样他们方能接受我们。\n为了达成这一使命，他们还带来了许多学者、书籍、地图作为奖励。这些学者、顾问的身份自然有些猫腻，他们时刻想要窥探我们的秘密。毫无疑问萨满们不会同意任何服从于外国宗教领袖的政策，如果我们拒绝宣誓萨满们会很高兴。然而他们所带来的知识也实在是不可估量，也许可以弥补由于得罪萨满所造成的后果。

original: We are loyal followers of the Roman Church.

A group of Christian missionaries from abroad has arrived in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] and are eager to spread the word of God among the heathens. Not wanting to come into conflict with our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], however, they come seeking our blessing. The leader of the group has approached the throne asking to be given the right to spread the Christian faith in a region under our control unhindered.
translation: 一群传教士经过长途跋涉，到达了[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]。他们的领导者来到[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]之前恳切请求，希望能得到[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]首肯，从而得以在我们的臣民中播撒福音而不受迫害。

original: Let them go wherever they please.
translation: 西洋人并无违法之事，反行禁止，实属不宜。

original: Send them back where they came from.
This province may come to change Religion in the future.
translation: 此省份未来可能会改变信仰
禁止他们向长生天的子民传教

original: The missionaries in [Root.GetName] have made good progress towards converting the local population there. Shamans have become an increasingly rare sight and a number of churches dot the landscape.
translation: 福音的种子已于[Root.GetName]深种——萨满越发少见，与此同时，一座座教堂拔地而起。

original: The presence of a mission in [Root.GetName] has led to a number of conflicts between the [Root.Religion.GetName] Shamans and the local Priests. Shamans have proclaimed curses over the priests and sometimes on entire congregations.
translation: [Root.GetName]的传教活动导致了[Root.Religion.GetName]萨满与当地传教士的一系列摩擦。萨满们决定施法诅咒他们。

original: It is time for the missionaries to leave.

The adoption of Christianity beside the traditional [Root.Religion.GetName] faith of our ancestors has given rise to a number of less than orthodox customs. Syncretic rituals that reference both the god of Christianity and the gods of the sky have become commonplace and some have even been adopted at the court of [Root.Monarch.GetName].\nWhile this seems to please most of our Christian subjects the delicate sensibilities of a Christian subject ruler visiting [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] have been deeply upset by his forced participation in such rituals.
translation: 基督教信仰与传统[Root.Religion.GetName]的共存促生了许多不太正统的仪式。天主与长生天时常在我们的宗教仪式上同时出现，有时甚至在[Root.Monarch.GetName]的宫廷中。\n虽说大多数基督徒臣民都对此颇为满意，但有位参观[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的基督徒封臣对这一系列仪式大为不满。

original: But they're both lords of heaven?
translation: 唉 这拜的不都是天么

original: Word has reached us of a remarkable wanderer. Drawing his power from his strong devotion to the Christian god he has managed to heal the weak and cure the sick. An increasing number of converts have begun to create congregations in his trail. Many still incorporate parts of their old Tengri customs in their daily life but this holy man has been more successful in attracting followers than many of the more traditional missionaries that now frequent our countryside.
translation: 我们听说有这么一个非同寻常的旅行者，对基督神的虔诚热情使他妙手回春你，因此越来越多的人开始信仰基督教，他走过的地方都留下了大批的信徒。尽管这些人里的大多数在日常生活中依然保留着自己长生天式的传统习俗，但是这个圣人在吸引追随者这一方面依然要比大多数活跃在乡间的传统传教士要成功的多。
让他继续在旷野中传道吧

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] has always taken a great interest in both our adopted religion and those that practice it. [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] has, however, not always led a life that many of our Christian subjects would approve of. Between the influence of Shamans at court and the habits of [Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] there are many that feel we are risking divine punishment.\nPerhaps we should consider instituting some more clearly Christian rules for our court and ruler? Restricting the influence of Shamans, the number of allowed wives and generally the number of officially sanctioned rituals would go a long way towards placating the Christian communities.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]对基督教和信徒展现出了极大的兴趣。然而 [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]并未全然皈依我主——至少在生活方式上。从宫廷中萨满的影响力和[Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]许多所作所为等等都直接违反了圣经的教导。\n也许我们该设立些更简洁明了的教导来指引我们的统治者？重订礼仪、限制萨满、封禁邪教仪式这些举措多半会为我们赢得许多基督徒的拥戴。

original: Theses religions must coexist, side by side.
Every province following our §YSyncretic§! faith will get §R6§! unrest for §Y10§! years.
translation: 所有信奉§Y兼容信仰§!的省份都会在§Y10§!年内有§R6§!叛乱风险

original: A battle of the minds and spirits of our people has ensued between Brahmin priests and Shamans, who consider themselves guides and protectors of our people. Lately heated discussions frequently end with Shamans cursing the Brahmins while the Brahmins turn to us, insisting that their hereditary status be respected.
translation: 婆罗门与萨满们开始了又一轮的论战，他们都认为自己是人民的引领和保护者。最近，已经白热化的争论最后总是不欢而散。萨满大骂婆罗门。后者希望我们能够为他们出头。

original: The coexistence of Hinduism and the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has been easier in many ways than we initially feared. There are already many examples of Tengri deities being incorporated among the many gods of the Hindus and of Hindu gods and customs being incorporated into the lives of the Tengri worshippers. In fact to a certain extent it seems that the same has started happening to many other religions in the far corners of our empire, with many lesser and higher gods being incorporated into the joint Hindu-Tengri Pantheon.
translation: 印度教与[Root.Religion.GetName]的融合比我们所想象的顺利多了。长生天信仰与印度信仰互相交融的例子在国家的各个角落都有发生，数不胜数。事实上，甚至在帝国边境，大小神灵都被吸收进了印度教 - 长生天的万神殿之中。

original: With the elevation of the Hindu faith a great number of Hindus have come to settle in many of our cities and with them the concept of caste is spreading into our lands. Interestingly it seems at least some of those that regularly do business with the Hindus as well as some of our Shamans have taken to this way to organize society.\nThe immediate effects seem hard to judge but for now everything seems to progress a bit more smoothly in [Root.GetName].
translation: 印度教的兴起不止吸引印度人移居我们治下的城市之中，还为我们带来并传播了他们的种姓制度。有趣的是，有一部分长期和印度人经商的人和一些萨满都开始接受他们的种姓制度了。\n短期而言，我们实在难以断言这是非好事，不过就现在而言，[Root.GetName]一切都还很稳定。

original: Word of our adoption of the Jewish religion has started to spread far and wide among the Jews of the Diaspora. A slow but increasingly steady trickle of immigrants have begun to appear at our borders, hoping to live and serve in a state where they are not confined to Ghettos or restricted by laws and prejudice.
translation: 我们接纳犹太教的消息已经传到了流散各地的犹太人耳中。一小批移民们出现在了边境。他们心中希望，自己能效力于一个不受压迫和歧视的国家中。
不断增长的祆教商人群体

original: While the Fire temples of [Root.GetName] probably seem a bit unorthodox to them our society is still attracting a number of Zoroastrians in the diaspora. Ever since they left Persia behind almost a millennium ago they have grown used to being the minority and seem content to mix with our society at large. Some, however, have come asking for an area of their own where they can live and worship in their traditional ways.
translation: 即使地处[Root.GetName]的祆教圣庙看起来并不太正规，它仍然吸引了许许多多流散的祆教信徒汇聚而来。这近乎一千年的流亡之中，绝大多数的祆教信徒已经习惯了自己作为少数派这一事实，人人皆与邻为善、安居乐业。然而也有例外——一些祆教信徒希望我们能划出一片区域给他们，使他们能依照自己的习惯生活。
嗯？你听说过「如糖融入牛奶」的故事么？

original: Best to keep them all in one place.
translation: 也好，聚在一块方便管理

original: Fusing our Shamanic traditions with the wide range of animist beliefs we have come across have resulted in an ever-growing Pantheon. There is not a malady, disaster or fate that hasn't got at least one deity to counteract it. This wide acceptance of differing spiritual traditions has led to an increasingly efficient handling of the religious conflicts between the subjects under our control, no matter what they believe.
translation: 萨满传统与泛灵传说的融合为我们的万神殿带来了无数神祇。日月星宿、春夏秋冬皆有其所对应的神祇。由于我们特有的包容性，宗教界的纷争对我们也不再有威胁了。

original: Court Shamans have always been an important institution in our state. [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] nobles participate in a wide range of ceremonies to ensure the gods looking favorable on our endeavors, be it going to war or sealing a strategic marriage. With the greatly increased numbers of Shamanic traditions we now patronize we can be sure of their support, a point not lost on our subjects.
translation: 宫廷萨满团一直以来都是我国政治结构的重要组成部分。[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 与[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的贵族们都积极参与各式宗教仪式以确保国家风调雨顺、百姓安居乐业。在我们的庇佑下，我们得到了萨满的支持。这般投入并非全无回报——
愿祖灵使我们无往不胜！

original: The Gods will bless our people.
translation: 愿祖灵护佑我们的百姓。

original: Inspired by Nahuatl forerunners our warriors have begun to raid foreign lands already subjugated by our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to take prisoners to be offered at the Sacrificial Stone to the heavens. This is slightly problematic as these are people who have agreed to obey us in exchange for protection but the experience these warriors get in close combat could be useful to us.
translation: 受到那瓦特人的影响，我们的武士自发地在已经臣服于[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的土地上大肆抓捕俘虏用于献祭。然而，这些民众已经向[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]臣服，以换取[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的保护；而另一方面，这些武士所获得的战斗经验对我们也很有价值。

original: Taking offense to the luxurious clothes of a merchant in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] a number of warriors have taken it upon themselves to storm his lavish home and rob him of his belongings. They claim such finery must be reserved for those that have distinguished themselves in battle and that they have rectified an offense to the gods. The merchant on the other hand is furious and demand retribution and for his property to be returned.
translation: [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的巨富极尽奢侈之能事——锦衣貂裘、宝马香车。他这般奢侈的生活激怒了一群战士——他们洗劫了他的住所并抢走了他所有的财产。他们宣称，只有战场上的勇士才配得上这样的华贵服饰，而那商人的所作所为实在是当受天谴。另一方面，那位商人已经快被气疯了……
个人所有权神圣而不可侵犯

original: The people of [Root.GetName] have been organizing their resistance against our rule through the local holy places and many of their leaders are to be found in the local clergy. Assimilation will surely quieten them in the long run but for now our Inti priests suggest that we confiscate their [Root.Religion.GetName] idols, by protecting them in our capital we can ensure that the people of [Root.GetName] remember where the real power lies.
translation: [Root.GetName]的民众时常借着宗教崇拜的借口，聚集在当地的宗教场所秘密集会、反对我们的统治。而他们的领导人也多为[Root.Religion.GetName]宗教领袖。面对这一情况，慢慢同化肯定是一个选择；收缴他们的[Root.Religion.GetName]神像又是另一个方法。而且我们可以将这些收缴上来的神像放置在首都，时时刻刻提醒他们——我们才是[Root.GetName]的主人。

original: Our Mayan priests are eager to promote the ritual ball games of their religion, a custom to which many of our warriors have been quite receptive. Many now flock to the courts to see their favorite teams compete though perhaps the associated betting is as much of an attraction as their religious conviction.
translation: 玛雅祭司们最近正在推广一个很有意思的宗教仪式——蹴球仪式。我们的武士们都对这个仪式挺感兴趣的。许多民众都纷纷跑到宫廷前围观比赛，有些是为了参与敬拜，有些则是为了趁机赌钱捞一笔。

original: Eager for all our subjects to be able to read and interpret the word of God themselves the Protestant priests of our country are seeking our support for creating a new Bible translation. They claim the new translation will bring our people together as never before and introduce them to the one god they worship.
translation: 为了让我们所有的臣民都能阅读上帝的话语，国中的新教祭司们向我们寻求帮助，以期重译新版圣经。他们认为，一本易读的圣经能够前所未有地将所有的信徒都团结在上帝之下。

original: The idea that 'All events whatsoever are governed by the secret counsel of God' is held dearly among the members of the Reformed church in our country. So much so that it has come to spread beyond to those that wouldn't be considered Christians by any definition. Whether it is due to this or not lately many of our subjects seem unusually eager to outdo themselves. Be it in areas of governance or economy.
translation: 「在永恒中，上帝就按其至圣至智的旨意，自由不变地预定了将来所要发生的一切」——加尔文所提出的预定论不只在归正宗信徒中广受支持，甚至是不信者也深信不疑。不知是否因为这个原因，在经济、政治领域上，许多的臣民超越自己都做出了卓越的贡献。

original: Gold is a measure of quality.

Some way back a number of our most pious Orthodox monks left the areas under our control in order to create a fortified frontier monastery in the wilder parts of the lands we border. The story of their success has attracted a number of believers to join them. Their settlement is now growing and will soon be noteworthy. Perhaps now would be a good time to claim the land for ourselves so that these settlers don't forget where they came from?
translation: 一段时间前，几位虔诚的东正修道士离开了国境，到旷野之中传讲神的道并建立修道院。近来，许多信徒都被他们成功的的故事吸引并加入了他们。再过不久，他们的聚落或许就将正式成为一个村镇乃至城市了。我们是否要派出官长，对这些民众进行管辖呢？

original: It is time we claim those lands for ourselves.

Eager to make a good profit of the various goods available in our lands merchants from the wider Muslim world continue to seek out our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. One such man is now claiming that we are not doing enough to capitalize on the resources under our control. For a modest fee he is offering to act as our agent in all contacts with foreign merchants in general and the influential finance groups such as the Karimis in particular.
translation: 穆斯林商人们源源不断地前来觐见我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，与我国商人互通有无，闷声发大财。其中一位宣称：我们需要更大力度地资本化我们的资源。只需要一笔小钱，他就能以他的人际网为我们招来无数巨富——甚至影响力远及苏杭的卡利米商团也包括在内

original: A strange disease has struck [Root.Heir.GetName], a fever that our Shamans have been unable to stop or even alleviate. A visiting Sunni physician claims to recognize the condition and to be able to cure it. Our Shamans would likely take offense if we brought in an outsider after their own widely known failure but the life of our heir seems to be at its end unless we do something.
translation: [Root.Heir.GetName]染上了一种奇怪的疾病，我们的萨满无力阻止甚至减缓这种热病。一个外来的逊尼派医生声称见过这种情况且能治愈它。在萨满们为众所知的失败后请一个外来者很有可能冒犯他们，但如果我们不做些什么的话继承人几乎肯定会死去

original: There is nothing we can do.

Our frequent wars have made the faithful Muslims of our state reluctant to undertake pilgrimages to the holy cities. While faith may frequently overcome fear it is true that pilgrims passing through our lands are often attacked and their journey is often a perilous ordeal.
translation: 由于我国战事不断，国中的穆斯林都不敢踏上朝觐的路。虽然信仰常能帮助他们克服恐惧，但过路的朝觐者是经常受到攻击的，这趟旅程对他们来说往往是一个危险的考验。
我们必须保证他们的安全.
他们的信仰会保佑他们。

original: While [Root.Monarch.GetName] has limited the influence of the Khojas compared to some of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] predecessors they remain a powerful force in our lands and many of our subjects look up to the Khoja and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] family. This powerful faction in our country has never outright confronted us but their ever-present influence is slowly eroding our authority.
translation: 尽管[Root.Monarch.GetName]近年来极力限制和卓们的影响， 相对于[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的前辈们，他们仍为我们领地中的一股有力的势力，而且我们众多的臣民依然敬仰这些和卓和[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的家族。他们从未挑战过我们，但长此以往，这一势力必将威胁我们的权威。

original: There is nothing to be done right now.
Attempt to limit the influence of the Khojas.
translation: 尝试闲着这些和卓们的影响力。

original: Can't sell provinces to subjects (for your own subjects, use Grant Province instead).
translation: 不能将省份卖给附庸国（对于你自己的附庸国，使用授予省份）

original: We don't own any provinces adjacent to them (or that are accessible by sea) that we can grant them.
translation: 没有可以授予他们的接壤的陆地省份或临海省份

original: We don't have any cores or claims adjacent to them (or that are accessible by sea) that we can grant them.
translation: 没有可以授予他们宣称权/核心的接壤陆地省份或临海省份

original: This would cause them to become overextended.
translation: 这会使得他们的领土过度扩张。

original: Grants them one of our own provinces. This would please them greatly.
translation: 授予他们一个省份，这将大大增进我们的关系。

original: We grant them $PROV|Y$ and our core on it. Their Liberty Desire will decrease by $LD$ and become $LD_TOTAL$.
translation: 授予他们$PROV|Y$并转让其核心。他们的独立倾向将降低$LD$至$LD_TOTAL$。

original: We grant them $PROV|Y$. Their Liberty Desire will decrease by $LD$ and become $LD_TOTAL$. Their overextension will increase to $OVEREXT$.
translation: 我们将授予他们$PROV|Y$。他们的独立倾向将降低$LD$至$LD_TOTAL$，过度扩张度将增加至$OVEREXT$。

original: We grant them $PROV|Y$. Their Liberty Desire will decrease by $LD$ and become $LD_TOTAL$.
translation: 我们将授予他们$PROV|Y$。他们的独立倾向将降低$LD$至$LD_TOTAL$。

original: Grants them one of our cores or claims.
translation: 授予他们我们的一个核心/宣称权。

original: We grant them our core on $PROV|Y$.
We grant them our claim on $PROV|Y$.
We grant them our core and claim on $PROV|Y$.
translation: 我们将授予他们$PROV|Y$的核心和宣称权。

original: to grant us the province of $PROV|Y$
We now own and have a core on $PROV$.
translation: 我们现在接管了$PROV$并得到了此省份核心
我们的过度扩张度增加至$OVEREXT$.

original: to grant them the province of $PROV|Y$
They now own and have a core on $PROV$.
translation: 他们现在得到了$PROV$及其核心。
他们的过度扩张度增加至$OVEREXT$.

original: to grant us their claim on $PROV|Y$
We now have a claim on $PROV$.
to grant us their core on $PROV|Y$
$PROV$ is now considered one of our core provinces.
translation: $PROV$成为了我们的一个核心省份。

original: The new regiment will automatically merge with this army, provided you do not move it.
translation: 新建军团将自动编入此部队，但此部队不可移动

original: The new ship will automatically merge with this navy, provided you do not move it.
translation: 如果你没有移动此舰队，新造舰船将自动编入

original: The new ship will change our value in this node by $PROFIT$¤
