translation: 新造舰船将改变我们节点的贸易价值 $PROFIT$¤

original: Hold §YShift§! to build up to §Yfive§! regiments rather than a single one.
translation: 按住§YShift§!键，一次编成 §Y5§! 个团。

original: Hold §YShift§! to build up to §Yfive§! ships rather than only one.
translation: 按住§YShift§!键，一次建造 §Y5§! 艘舰船。

original: The new ships will change our value in this node by $PROFIT$¤
translation: 新造舰船将改变我们节点的贸易价值 $PROFIT$¤

original: Changing to a §Y$NAME$§! in our colonies will lower our Stability by §R1§! and have the following effect:\n
translation: 在我们的殖民地推行§Y$NAME$§!政策将降低我国§R1§!点稳定度并产生以下效果：\n

original: Changing to a §Y$NAME$§! in our colonies will have the following effect:\n
translation: 在我们的殖民地推行§Y$NAME$§!政策将产生以下效果：\n

original: There is a §Y$CHANCE$§!% chance per month of a Native Uprising.
translation: 本地土著每月叛乱可能性为：§Y$CHANCE$§!%

original: If we would start colonizing this province, there would be a §Y$CHANCE$§!% chance per month of a Native Uprising.
translation: 开始殖民后，本地土著每月叛乱可能性为：§Y$CHANCE$§!%

original: Native Uprising has a base chance of §Y$BASE$§!% modified by:\n$MOD$
translation: 土著抵抗几率每月基础值为§Y$BASE$§!%，受以下因素修正：\n$MOD$

original: We are adopting a 'live and let live' attitude towards natives which will decrease the chances of native uprisings.
translation: 对原住民采取「和平共处」的态度，我们将有更高的几率同化原住民。

original: We will trade with the natives and profit from it.
translation: 我们与原住民互市，互通有无。

original: We will treat the natives ruthlessly from now on. This will increase the frequency of their raids, but also allow our colony to grow faster.
translation: 选择这个选项意味着从现在开始我们将强势弹压原住民。这将会增加他们袭击的频率，但我们的殖民地也会发展得更快。

original: §RYour country is too disorganized to change Native Policy. You need to increase Stability first.§!
translation: §R社会极其不稳，完全无法改变政策——需先行提高稳定度§!

original: §ROnly light ships can be built for trade and privateer fleets.§!
translation: §R商队/私掠船队只能接收轻型船只§!

original: §RCannot build to navy units on exploration missions.§!\n
translation: §R正在执行探索任务，不能将船只直接编入§!\n
§R正处于预备封存中，不能将船只直接编入§!\n

original: §RCannot build to units that are being transported.§!\n
translation: §R不能将待建的新舰船编入自动运输中的舰队。§!\n

original: §RCannot build to navy units on the open sea.§!\n
translation: §R正处于海上，不能将船只直接编入§!\n

original: This threatens them with war over a province you have a claim or core on. There is a chance they will back down depending on how much they fear you. If they do not, a war for that province starts. If on the other hand they accept and you gain the province, there will be a truce.
translation: 只有当你拥有对方某一省份宣称权或核心时，你才能够威胁开战。如若对方服软，你将接管该省份；反之，一场争夺该省份的战争将会在两国间爆发。

original: We will demand $PROV|Y$ from $THEM$ under the threat of war.
translation: 我们将以武力胁迫$THEM$交出$PROV|Y$。

original: Because of the §Y$TAKERS$§! claim, we will declare a war of $CBTYPE$ if they refuse.
translation: 若对方拒绝，我们将凭借§Y$TAKERS$§!的宣称权发动一场$CBTYPE$战争。

original: Because of the §Y$TAKERS$§! core, there will be a war of $CBTYPE$ if they refuse.
translation: 若对方拒绝，两国之间将因§Y$TAKERS$§!的核心爆发一场$CBTYPE$战争。

original: §RYou need at least one Colonist before you can choose Native Policy.§!
translation: §R需要有至少一名殖民者，方能选择土著政策。§!

original: A total of $VALUE$ Prestige will be divided between §Y$WHO$§! and its allies.
If they accept, §Y$PROV$§! becomes §Y$TAKERS$§! and we gain $AE$ Aggressive Expansion. They lose $PRESTIGE$ prestige. There will be a truce until $TRUCEDATE|Y$.
translation: 若他们服软，§Y$PROV$§!将被划归§Y$TAKERS$§!治下，我国将因此增加$AE$侵略扩张。对方将失去$PRESTIGE$威望。和约有效期至$TRUCEDATE|Y$。

original: My $MONARCHTITLE$, the villainous scoundrels of $ACTOR$ §RThreatens War§! if we do not cede them $PROV$. Accepting will cost us $PRESTIGE$ prestige and enforce a truce until $TRUCEDATE|Y$.\n\nIf we refuse, they will declare war upon us.
translation: 尊敬的$MONARCHTITLE$，可憎的无赖$ACTOR$向我们§R威胁开战§!，要求我们割让$PROV$给他们。如果同意割地，我们将损失$PRESTIGE$威望，并与他们签订有效期至$TRUCEDATE|Y$的休战协议。\n\n如果我们拒绝割地，他们将向我们宣战。

original: You cannot Threaten War while there is a truce.
translation: 你不能在和约期间威胁开战。

original: They hold no unoccupied provinces that are cores or claims of ours that we can make cores (and that aren't their capital).
translation: 他们首都之外没有任何未沦陷省份是我们的核心或宣称。

original: They are a subject, use this action on their Overlord $OVERLORD|Y$ instead.
translation: 他们是附属国，请对他们的宗主国$OVERLORD|Y$使用此行动。

original: We must force them to relocate.
translation: 我们必须强制让他们迁移。

original: §Y$WHO$§! are already forced to migrate to §Y$PROV$§!.
After the recent Native Uprising, another Uprising is not expected until after §Y$DATE$§!.
translation: 土著作乱刚过去不久，§Y$DATE$§!前不会再次发生叛乱。

original: to grant them our claim on $PROV|Y$
They now have a claim on $PROV$.
translation: 他们获得了对于$PROV$的宣称权

original: to grant them our core on $PROV|Y$
$PROV$ is now considered one of their core provinces.
§ROnly the host can change this option.§!\n
Controls the chance of fantasy elements such as highly advanced Native Empires to appear in the Random New World.
translation: 控制在随机新大陆出现幻想元素（如高度发达的土著帝国）的几率。

original: Wastelands will be colored if a country owns a majority of surrounding provinces.
translation: 荒芜省份将被涂上周边主要控制者的颜色。

original: Shows monthly province income as animated map text.
translation: 在地图上显示省份月度税收。

original: Use Region names for exclaves (e.g. 'Swedish Kongo' instead of 'Sweden').
translation: 飞地命名使用地区名（如以「瑞典 刚果」代替「瑞典」）。

original: §RCannot add Random New World to savegame.§!
translation: §R不可以在存档里添加随机新大陆。§!

original: You need to be logged on to Steam to view achievements.
translation: 只有登陆Steam后 才能启用成就系统。

original: Achievements can no longer be earned
Achievements could be earned when the loaded game was last played.\nIf you continue, achievements can no longer be earned due to:\n$REASON$
translation: 只有当读取的是最近的存档时，才能启用成就系统。\n由于以下原因无法启用成就系统：\n$REASON$

original: The selected savegame is not saved in Ironman mode.
§RCannot create Random New World while creating a Custom Nation§!
translation: §R无法在建立自定义国家时，选择随机新大陆§!

original: §RCannot load save after creating Random New World§!
translation: §R创建随机新大陆后，无法读取存档§!

original: §RCannot change start date after creating Random New World§!
translation: §R创建随机新大陆后，无法改变开始时间§!

original: Unless a man has been born to the privilege he will not be allowed access to the higher positions in our armies and we strive to maintain a corps of officers entirely made out of persons of noble birth. Some would say this limits our leadership but to us it is a way to ensure that our country is led by the same families that have always brought it to greatness.
translation: 唯有世家子弟方能在我军军中成为高级军官。我们一直致力于确保军官团体的血统纯洁。有些人认为这损害我们军队的领导力，实际上恰恰相反——我们认为唯有那些血管中流淌着英雄之血的英武青年，方能带领我们走向一次又一次的胜利。

original: We have caved in to the demands of our non-Muslim subjects and abolished many taxes aimed specifically at them and their pilgrimages.
translation: 在臣民的强烈反对下，我们决定不再向卡菲勒们征收额外税金。

original: In order to restore the proper order of things in this area we have stopped local infidel landholders from spending lavishly on constructions to honor their deity. This has placated some factions in our country but the population here is very displeased and is actively evading paying taxes and contributing to the state.
translation: 为了维护稳定，我们将禁止卡菲勒们以任何形式公开敬拜他们的神祇。虽然这一决定让我们国中的穆斯林团体欢欣鼓舞，但这些卡菲勒居然极其不识好歹地开始逃税漏税和为我们国家做贡献！
得到宗教狂热分子支持

original: Our support for those in the religious establishment that would actively undermine the rights of the Dhimmi has resulted in animosity between us and our non-Muslim subjects, ironically severely harming our ability to convert them.
translation: 由于我们公然站在极度弹压齐米、卡菲勒的宗教狂热分子这一边，这直接导致我们与齐米和卡菲勒之间出现了一条鸿沟————他们开始极度反感伊斯兰教，这使得我们的传教活动事倍功半。

original: We have decided to turn the courtly life of our country into the most elaborate formality imaginable. As everyone who is anyone is expected to attend our ruler in the capital this limits the ability of the Nobility to plot quite a lot but it does come at a high cost.
translation: 我们决定将我国的宫廷规范变得更正式且灵活多变.如此一来,任何想参与到王都的参谋活动的有能力的贵族子弟,则变得限制更少花费更低.

original: Having alienated the Nobility we are left with very few supporters among the leaders of our armies. Their priorities are clearly not to win our wars and some can even be suspected of actively working against us.
translation: 随着军事贵族的不合作,我们在军队中的支持者越来越少.这些军人首要的事情明显不是赢得战争,我们甚至怀疑这些军头进行一些反抗我们的活动.

original: Our council is dominated by a member of one of the finest noble families in our country. His wide network of contacts ensures that we can impress nobles at home as well as abroad.
translation: 我国议会中,那些来自最悠久历史的贵族门阀占据着最主要的地位.他们广阔的人脉网络确保我们能对国内外的贵族了如指掌.

original: One of the more talented members of our council is a successful merchant. Having made his own fortune he has wasted no time increasing the efficiency of our economy. His network of contacts among the merchant communities also ensures that our state is in tune with the Burghers.
translation: 我国政厅中,最有能力的大臣都是那些最成功的财阀商人.他们对于创造财富增长经济十分热衷.他们的商业圈人脉让确保我们能够对市民阶层了如指掌.

original: One of the more talented ministers in our council has been recruited from the clergy. While this is far from unusual it means he can rely on their support and that local clerics in our administration are even more loyal to him, increasing our control over even the farthest corners of our realm.
translation: 我国政厅中,最有能力的大臣都是来自于教会的僧侣.这种状况意味着他们能够依靠着本地教区教士对领民进行管理统治,这样能够增加我国对每一片领土的控制力度.

original: A very talented member of our council has a background among the Dhimmi. This is not exactly popular with everyone in our state but the support of his own estate is a benefit to our country.
translation: 我国政厅中,最有能力的大臣都有齐米阶层的背景身份.齐米阶层在我国并不是大众阶层,但这阶级的力量还是能给我国带来一定利益.

original: We have implemented a series of harsh restrictions on who can and cannot buy certain luxury items. From clothes and jewels to perfume and the exact height or number of windows of a house everything should reflect the proper social standing of the owner. Apart from cementing social boundaries this has resulted in a sharp decline in prices for most goods that have anything to do with the restrictions.
translation: 我们实施了一系列严厉的，关于能否购买奢侈品的禁令。从服饰到珠宝首饰再到香水，那些用于满足我国上流阶层的高档产品。这道禁令除了缓和社会矛盾，还有效让大多商品物价锐降。

original: Our Merchants are losing money due to our political decisions regarding trade policies and tariffs.
translation: 我国商人正因我国失败的商业政策和关税制度而损失利润。

original: Our Merchants have been granted various rights to compensate for their loss of income from government instigated trade policies and politically motivated tolls and tariffs.
translation: 在我国政府所发起的贸易新政以及提高关税、船只通行费等政策中，我国的商人们损失了不少。为弥补他们的损失，我们现在已经给予了他们许多特权。

original: A rising number of people without ties to the clergy or nobility are currently attempting to make careers for themselves in the administration of our state.
translation: 在国内，一个既不属教士阶层也不属贵族阶层的群体正在慢慢壮大，他们正试图在我国行政机关中求得一官半职。

original: There is discord between the groups residing in the capital city in this province. The use of the Putting-Out System by some of its residents has undermined guild rules in regards to pricing and methods.
translation: 存在在本省省会城市内的各群体之间出现了不和。市内一些市民对家庭包工制的实施破坏了城市行会的限制性行规，这包括商人行会的定价策略以及行业中的各项管理办法。
被我们捍卫的行会特权

original: By defending the rights of the guilds in the capital city of this province we have strengthened relations with the Burghers here. For the time being they're more committed to keeping our peace and the city has mysteriously begun to yield higher taxes.
translation: 由于我们对行会权利的保护，省内首府城市内的市民们与我们的关系愈发变好了。或许是暂时性的，这些人现在更愿安分待着，不给我们添麻烦了，不仅如此，这座城市莫名奇妙的不再反对我们的高税负政策了。

original: We have acted to protect the established classes against the ambition of the rising class of 'New Men' who aim to replace them in many higher positions of power within the state, from the army to the administrative apparatus or even the court rooms. The Merchant classes from which the new men originated see our actions as disloyal and ungrateful.
translation: 我们已经采取行动以保护旧阶层免受新崛起的新兴阶层威胁，这些新阶层的人们想取代旧有阶层在国家中占据的机要职位,他们的野心从军队遍布至政府机关，甚至还想染指宫廷。而现在的商人阶层正是源自于这些新兴阶层,他们将我们的做法视为不忠与背叛。

original: We have encouraged the Burghers to compete with the Nobles and Clergy for positions in our administration, army and navy. Much to the dismay of the formerly privileged estates.
translation: 我们正鼓励市民阶层去与贵族阶层及教士阶层同台竞争，鼓励他们争取在政府行政，陆军以及海军中挤掉教士们和贵族们的位置，这让旧特权阶层的人们感到十分恐惧。
郊区卫生情况不容乐观！

original: The capital city of this area has grown too quickly to cope with the great number of new inhabitants. Suburbs have grown up where disease thrives and crime is rampant.
translation: 此地区的首府城市发展太过迅速，以至于它根本无法消化这么多的新居民。现在这座城市的周围的乡下地方疾病蔓延，犯罪猖獗。

original: Our court is dominated by the priestly caste and the rules of their scriptures. These strict rules are necessary to keep the favor of our strong clergy but many of our subjects, both high and low, feel alienated by this archaic way of life.
translation: 我国的宫廷被一班手执《圣经》的教牧人员所主宰。国内严格的教律政策能够讨好这些强势的教士，但很多其他的臣民，无论高位还是低位，都厌烦这种古老落后的生活方式。

original: Despite the protests of the Ulema we are employing large numbers of non-Muslims in our government apparatus.
translation: 尽管乌理玛阶层强烈反对，我们还是雇佣了许多非穆斯林的公务员到政府机关来工作。

original: A mix of old mystic beliefs and more orthodox ideas have helped make our state religion more palatable to the heathens.
translation: 集合了旧式神秘主义信仰以及更为正统的理念的宗教政策，能帮助我们更容易的说服国内的异教徒们皈依真正的信仰。

original: Our support for the clergy in their attempts to root out uneducated syncretism both at home and abroad among recent converts is unifying members of the true faith in our lands.
translation: 在最近的传教活动中，我们正在支持教士们肃清那些国内外没教养的归一主义者。我们的这一举动使我们国内那些笃信真正信仰的人们与我们越来越团结。

original: We are supplying the Cossacks of the steppes from our own coffers to tie them closer to us and to make them more resilient against Tartars, weather and wind.
translation: 我们从仓库里掏出物资,全力供给在草原上的哥萨克人.让他们能更加依赖于我们,以及抵挡前来侵略鞑靼人,还有帮助他们度过严冬与风雪.

original: Our Cossack subjects are used to living on the frontier, far from well-defined borders and close to tartar raids and a sometimes harsh climate. This experience has turned out to be invaluable in similar lands we are settling such as in Central Asia or Siberia.
translation: 我们的哥萨克臣民过去居住在边境前线,十分靠近鞑靼人,而且经常承受极端天气.在中亚及西伯利亚的定居这来说,这样的经验是十分宝贵的.

original: We have given away extensive rights to the colonization of the New World to encourage our leading merchant families to invest there.
translation: 我们给予新大陆殖民地更大的权利，以鼓励我国的商人去那里投资。

original: We have encouraged missionary activity in our colonies, working closely with the clergy of our country.
translation: 我们鼓励传教活动在我国殖民地中进行，这样我国的教士们才更加的活跃的工作。

original: Much to the ire of our Ulema and existing aristocracy we have actively sought to ennoble and integrate a number of prominent Dhimmi nobles into our own group of nobles.
translation: 我国的乌理玛阶层以及旧贵族们十分的忿怒,皆因我们对齐米阶层给予相当的荣耀,以及整合他们成为本国占主导新兴贵族.

original: Religious Zealots have forced us to adopt a number of laws and restrictions based on their interpretation of what the religiously ideal state should be like.
translation: 国内的宗教狂热者们,强迫我们同意并通过一系列法律禁令.这些法令的作用是干扰那些不被他们喜欢的宗教理念.

original: We have agreed that the more powerful tribes should not have to let their leaders serve as generals in our armies.
translation: 我们同意让那些较强大的部落的部落首领不用到我们的军队中服役.

original: Every province controlled by the §YDhimmi§! will gain §R15%§! Local Autonomy.
translation: 每一个被 §Y齐米§! 控制的省份将会获得 §R15%§! 本土自治度.

original: Forced other to give up Claim on us
translation: 强迫其他国家放弃对我国的领土宣称.
确立新大陆的传教活动

original: Refused Tribal Leaders Freedom of Service: §Y$VAL$%§!
Denied Right to Bypass Trade Restrictions: §Y$VAL$%§!
translation: 拒签绕开贸易禁令的权限: §Y$VAL$%§!

original: This interaction is available because of:\n
translation: 此互动选项可用，由于以下原因：\n

original: This interaction is NOT available because of:\n
translation: 此互动选项不可用，由于以下原因：\n

original: This interaction can be used once every $YEARS|Y$ year(s).
translation: 此互动选项每$YEARS|Y$年能使用一次。
齐米阶层的影响力衰落: §Y$VAL$%§!
齐米阶层的影响力上升: §Y$VAL$%§!
齐米阶层的影响力上升: §Y$VAL$%§!
异教徒被拒绝担任高级官员: §Y$VAL$%§!

original: Nobles expected to be in Capital: §Y$VAL$%§!
translation: 贵族们期待参与到首都宫廷: §Y$VAL$%§!
市民阶层权威得以确立: §Y$VAL$%§!
市民阶层的权威受到质疑: §Y$VAL$%§!

original: Supplied Cossacks with Food and Arms: §Y$VAL$%§!
translation: 给哥萨克提供食物与武器: §Y$VAL$%§!
拒绝扩大哥萨克人的特权: §Y$VAL$%§!

original: Refused to supply men to Tribes: §Y$VAL$%§!
Expanded the number of Registered Cossacks: §Y$VAL$%§!
translation: 扩大哥萨克阶级的规模: §Y$VAL$%§!

original: Expanded the number of Registered Cossacks: §G$VAL$§!
translation: 扩大哥萨克阶级的规模: §G$VAL$§!
支持市民阶层反对哥萨克人: §Y$VAL$%§!
齐米阶层占据行政部门: §Y$VAL$%§!

original: The $ESTATE_NOBLES$ complain that an increasing number of serfs are deserting the safe homes provided to them to seek their fortune among the Cossacks of the Steppes. They feel we are to blame as we have allowed the Cossacks to grow too powerful which is inspiring the serfs to abandon their rightful masters.\nRepresentatives of the major families now demand that we limit the power of the Cossacks so that they can expand their latifundia in the regions bordering the steppe. This way, they argue, the wild fields can be tamed and the laws of the realm upheld.
translation: $ESTATE_NOBLES$抱怨越来越多的农奴正在抛弃提供给他们的安全家园，去到草原上的哥萨克人中寻求财富。他们认为我们应该为允许哥萨克人变得过于强大而受到指责，这也激励了这些农奴去背叛他们合法的主人。\n现在权势家族的代表要求我们限制哥萨克人的力量，以便能够在与草原接壤的地区扩大这些家族的领地。他们坚持，通过这种方式，野性可以被驯服，法律可以被维护。

original: These Serfs must be brought back.

Moving quickly by boat or on horseback, the Cossacks of the steppes are very adept raiders. Several such raids have lately laid waste to our countryside and even major cities some way from our borders. Once the raids have been executed these plunderers retreat back behind the borders of [cossacks_here_target.GetName] as quickly as they came. Both the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ and our $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ have interests in the affected areas and both groups now demand that we do something.
translation: 依靠船只及快马迅速移动的哥萨克人十分擅长各种奇袭。几次的突然袭击几乎把我国的边境甚至一些主要城市洗劫一空。这些强盗抢劫完后，就立刻退回[cossacks_here_target.GetName]的边界内。我国的$ESTATE_NOBLES$和$ESTATE_BURGHERS$对那些受到侵袭的地区很感兴趣，并要求我们做点什么。

original: Demand that these Cossacks be brought to Justice!
translation: 让这些哥萨克人接受正义的制裁！

original: We will just have to let this slide.
translation: 我们做做表面文章算了。

original: Moving quickly by boat or on horseback the Cossacks of the steppes are very adept raiders. Several such raids have lately laid waste to the [From.GetAdjective] countryside and even major cities some way from our borders.\nAs the Cossacks responsible are based inside our borders the [From.GetAdjective] have now demanded both compensation and for the culprits to be brought to justice.
translation: 草原上的哥萨克人依靠船只及快马迅速移动，十分擅长奇袭。几次突然袭击几乎把[From.GetAdjective]的乡村甚至一些主要城市洗劫一空。\n我们保护着国境内的哥萨克人，故[From.GetAdjective]要求我们赔偿，并对匪徒进行制裁。

original: This matter is beyond our control.
translation: 事情已经超过我们的控制。

original: The [From.GetAdjective] response is that they refuse to take responsibility for the raids into our country, claiming that they are unable to control the Cossacks themselves.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]的回复了我们，他们拒绝对发生在我国的袭击活动负责，并宣称没有能力控制他们的哥萨克人。

original: We care little for such excuses.
translation: 我们并不接受这样的借口。

original: The [From.GetAdjective] response has been to send some monetary compensation for the raids of their Cossack subjects which has made up for the damage to property. They also claim that they have brought the guilty parties to justice.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]回复了我们，他们为治下的哥萨克人袭击我国赔偿了一些金币，同时声称他们会把犯人绳之以法。

original: If we could only believe that.

While few would dispute their influence on the Steppes the Cossacks have many things working against them when it comes to gaining influence in the halls of power. The $ESTATE_NOBLES$ despise them and would see them all brought to work as serfs on their latifundia and their manners have not brought them many friends in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName].\nLately, however, things have been going their way. They have managed to defend their settlements and their services to the state as raiders are undisputable.
translation: 尽管没有人会质疑哥萨克人在草原上的影响力，他们在想得到朝堂上的影响力时就有重重困难。$ESTATE_NOBLES$瞧不起他们，觉得他们只配做农奴在庄园里工作。他们的习惯导致在[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]不会有什么朋友。\n不过现在呢，事情总是在发展。他们成功地保卫了自己的定居点，并且作为突袭者效忠国家的身份已经不再被质疑。

original: The free nature of the Cossacks and the distance between them and the halls of power in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] has always been a problem for them. Lacking hereditary privileges the number of Cossacks registered with the state as officers with the benefits that entail have been decreasing steadily.
translation: 天性自由的哥萨克因为距离[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]较远，一直游历于中央政治权力之外，这一直是他们的一个问题。由于缺乏世袭特权，哥萨克所带来的利益随着他们在国内的登簿官员数量在不断减少。

original: Not all Cossacks are awarded the same privileges by the state. Traditionally rights are awarded to specific Cossacks that are willing to perform great services to the state in times of war. As these rights are not transferrable upon death this means that the influence of the Cossacks can vary greatly over time. According to the Cossacks it is high time we grant them further privileges to bolster our numbers.
translation: 国家没有给予所有的$ESTATE_COSSACKS$相同的特权.传统而言,这些特权只有少数为国而战甘心献身的$ESTATE_COSSACKS$才能获得.而这些特权是没法世袭的,因此$ESTATE_COSSACKS$只能将他们的影响力延续到死的前一刻.根据这些情况,$ESTATE_COSSACKS$认为是时候让我们将这些特权的年限延长,以巩固他们的固有数量.
让更多的哥萨克人来登记吧！

original: Let them tend to their Steppes.
translation: 再这样,让他们回到草原去.

original: Life on the frontier can be harsh and while the Cossacks are used to fighting their own battles a little help from the central treasury could probably be put to good use. Last season was unusually harsh and together with an increasing number of Tatar incursions many Cossacks now have an urgent shortage of food for the coming months. If we were to supply the Cossacks with grain as well as military supplies such as arms and uniforms we would not only be strengthening our defenders on the Steppes directly we would likely also tie them closer to our state.
translation: $ESTATE_COSSACKS$在国境前线的生活十分严峻,同时他们面对战争时候通常会损失惨重,并甚少获得国家援助.而上一个季度中,严冬与鞑靼人的袭击双双而至.如今很多$ESTATE_COSSACKS$面临严重的食物短缺以支撑至下个月.如果我们现在除了给予$ESTATE_COSSACKS$食物,还给予他们武器与军服.我们不仅增强了我国在草原上的防卫力量,还直接拉近了与他们的关系.
给他们送去需要的东西。

original: They'll have to make do themselves.
translation: 他们需要自己动手丰衣足食。

original: There has always been tension between the Cossacks and the other estates, if nothing else because of their uncommon manners and diverse backgrounds. Lately, however, these have increased considerably. The $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ are alarmed at the Cossacks raids and claim that they are targeting shipments of their grain. The Cossacks themselves claim that they are only attacking the Tartars and brigands in the area and that the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ are simply mistaken. As there is little in the way of government representation in the area it is difficult to ascertain the truth but there is clearly friction between these two groups and we are expected to either reprimand or sanction one side in this conflict.
translation: 最近，哥萨克与其他阶层的关系十分紧张，无非是因为他们那不合群的礼节和离群的背景身份，而这些代沟更随着时间越渐加深。这次，$ESTATE_BURGHERS$声称并警告哥萨克行劫他们谷物商船的行为。哥萨克声称只是在边土上攻击鞑靼人和盗匪，$ESTATE_BURGHERS$单纯地误会了。但在那种边土，政府很少对那里进行干预，很难对真相作出判断，但国内两个利益集团的摩擦是十分清晰的。可我们希望双方必须保持克制，理清权责，淡化冲突并共同发展。

original: The life of the Steppes has made the Cossacks used to a frontier living. Constant threats from both a harsh climate in an unsettled land and of Tartar raiders have made the Cossacks both feared warriors and hardy settlers.\nAs we turn our sights on the lands of Central Asia and Siberia it is becoming apparent that life on the eastern frontier is not that different from that of the Steppes we already control.
translation: $ESTATE_COSSACKS$过去一直生活在边塞.恶劣天气和鞑靼人的不间断威胁将$ESTATE_COSSACKS$磨砺成无谓的勇士和当地顽强居民.\n而现在我国发展的目光投向了中亚与西伯利亚的土地,因此对东边的边塞,已经不满足于我们已控制的草原地区.

original: Leave them alone, relations will improve in due time.
translation: 别管他们,在适当的时候再寻求解决.

original: Borders can often be theoretical things, especially in the wild fields. It seems the Cossacks have expanded rapidly into an area that previously wasn't under their control. We could attempt to reverse this development but the Cossacks would likely not take kindly to being removed from land they have worked hard to settle.
translation: 国与国的边境通常都是呈现在地图上的理论性产物,尤其在荒芜的土地上.这意味着,$ESTATE_COSSACKS$能迅速的扩张到他们早先没有控制的地方. 我们可以把这些地方还回去,但$ESTATE_COSSACKS$不会喜欢离开他们已然辛苦劳作过的地方.

original: The old dream of the Cossacks has always been to be accepted as the equals to the established estates such as the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ or $ESTATE_BURGHERS$. Never has this dream been closer to realization than now. The Cossacks have achieved great influence in our state and in many ways we rely on their support.\nGiven the favorable circumstances many Cossacks are now voicing their old demands for official recognition and privileges.
translation: $ESTATE_COSSACKS$的夙愿一直是是拥有和其他旧有阶层平等的地位，像$ESTATE_NOBLES$或$ESTATE_BURGHERS$一样。而现在这个夙愿是如此的逼近。$ESTATE_COSSACKS$在我国国内的很多方面受到依仗，并获得巨大影响力。\n而这个充满希望的境况，让$ESTATE_COSSACKS$再度向中央请求他们的夙愿并获得特权。

original: Unimpressed by our decree to vacate [Root.GetName] the Cossack host there has risen in revolt.
translation: 对我们撤销[Root.GetName]的封地感到不满，哥萨克阶级起义了。

original: Good relations need to be maintained. As their numbers grow and some of the leaders of the Cossacks grow older our warm relations have grown colder. We need to make arrangements with the current breed of Cossacks leaders in order to be sure of their loyalty.
translation: 好的关系需要被维系.而原来十分热情的$ESTATE_COSSACKS$现在却变得越发冷淡.我们需要和他们达成协议以修复他们的忠诚.

original: Tensions between Nomads and Sedentary Population
translation: 部落居民与农耕居民的紧张关系

original: The difference between tax collection, extortion or demanding tribute can sometimes be somewhat vague. In many parts of our country taxes are collected by the Nomadic Clans in ways very similar to how they would have conducted themselves during a raid.\nToday an emissary from some of our more well-to-do subjects arrived to tell a tale of how the would-be tax collectors pillaged their lands and then laid siege to their fortified homes. They now demand retribution from the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and for the perpetrators to be punished. The tribes would, however, likely not take kindly to any such restrictions of their conduct.
translation: 有时候,赋税,勒索甚至强迫进贡之间的界限其实十分模糊.特别是在我国税收的时候,在依靠游牧部落进行征税时,就像指挥他们去抢劫.\n今天信使从我国臣民那送来封上访信,控诉那些税吏是怎样在他们的土地上横征暴敛.现在他要求[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]对这些肇事者进行执法惩罚.可那些游牧居民不会乐意接受这样的处罚.

original: A tribal state is always somewhat unstable. Some clans will quickly increase their influence over the others, only to collapse again just as suddenly. Lately a new group of tribal leaders have come to extend their power over the lesser tribes considerably.
translation: 一个部落国家通常是某种不稳定的存在.一些部落会发展十分迅速,然后又迅速衰败.而最近又有一波部落在其首领的带领下迅速发展状态到傲视其他小部落.

original: Due to infighting between clans, poorly thought out political maneuvers and conflicts relating to succession our influence over the other tribes has increased considerably during the last few years. This decline in tribal influence is unlikely to last but comes as a nice respite for now.
translation: 由于部落间的内讧,这种未经过深思熟虑的政治手段和冲突在部落交往之间越发增加使用次数. 这种部落影响力的衰落不会持续太久,但对于现在来说确实一个喘息机会.

original: Several Clan Chiefs have complained to us about young men from their area leaving their clans and joining our own army. They claim that this is not how it was done in the days of our father, and that every man should serve in his local clan's army first. What shall we do?
translation: 一些部落的酋领控诉说,他们部落的一些年轻人离开了部落来参加我国的正规军队.他们同时也说,在他们父辈的年代,部落的年轻人要先为部落而服役才是传统.现在,我们该怎么做？
把那些年轻人送回家去.

original: One of our closest advisors has come to us with proof of the local Chiefs not paying much tax to us as one should expect from their lands. This is a delicate situation, but we need to come to a decision quickly.
translation: 我们一位忠心的大臣给我们呈上一份报告，有部落酋领私自扣压他们领土的税金不肯上交。这不算一件大事，但我们必须尽快作出处理决定。
他们的地盘，他们说了算！
我们的游牧部落正陷入混乱！

original: Keeping nomadic tribes together is never an easy task and right now we are living through some dire times. The $ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$ could very likely help us stabilize the situation so that we can get back on our feet but we would be increasing their influence over our state.
translation: 把游牧部落团结在一起并不是一件容易的事,特别是我们身处于这个艰难时刻.$ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$很可能能够帮助我们稳定局面,使我们能够恢复过来，但这也会导致他们对我国的影响力进一步增长。

original: We do not need their help.
Our Tribes view the Horde as weak!
translation: 我们的游牧部落羸弱不堪！

original: Our military leadership is inexperienced and weak. The $ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$ are questioning if they can really follow such green men into battle, offering instead to supply us with seasoned warriors ready to lead our troops.
translation: 我们的军事领袖缺乏经验而且软弱.因此$ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$怀疑我们的部落是否能跟随这种菜鸡上战场，并提议他们给我们提供一些经验丰富的战士来领导我们的军队.

original: We do not need their help.

Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has proven [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] unable to keep the [Root.GetAdjective] unified and the $ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$ worry that we are becoming the object of ridicule. Prominent clan leaders have approached the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] offering to strengthen our rule though some would say that relying on others to enforce this unity makes for an unstable peace.
translation: 我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]已然证明了[Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]没有能力维系[Root.GetAdjective]的团结,$ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$则担心我们会变成臣民的笑柄. 这时候带头的部族领袖表示,愿意向[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]示忠,以此来增加我们的统治实力.但这也惹来了非议,有些人说依靠他人来换取团结统一会只能导致一段不稳定的短暂和平.

original: We do not need their help.

One of the Clan Chiefs has come forward, as a spokesman for their group, and urges us to return to the old ways, the ways that made us strong. 'Crush your enemies, drive them before you, and hear the lamentations of their women!'
translation: 一个作为部落的发言人的酋领要求我们，必须回到那条能使我们变强的老路上,'击溃你的敌人,把他们带到你跟前，要他们倾听自己女人的哀嚎!'

original: That is what is good in life.
Not content to sit idly by while we take control over their lands the Tribes of [Root.GetName] have taken up arms against us.
translation: 在我们控制[Root.GetName]土地的时候,他并没有坐以待毙,而是拉起军队对抗我们.

original: A distant cousin of [Root.Monarch.GetName] has managed to gain the gratitude of the tribes. Many strong tribal leaders are now demanding that we change the future plans of succession to ensure that this cousin is guaranteed his rightful place as [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. Whether they are motivated by true loyalty to our kinsman or feel he could easily be controlled is hard to tell but they would certainly not take refusal to follow their advice very well.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]的一个远亲成功地获得了部落的感激. 许多强大的部落领袖要求我们改变未来继承人的顺位,确保这位远亲能够继承[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的地位. 不论这些酋领的动机是真的出于忠诚,还是只因为这位亲戚易于掌控.但是他们的建议非常难以拒绝.

original: These tribes must know their place!
translation: 这些部落酋领应该知道他们的身份斤两!

original: Prominent Tribal leaders have approached us demanding that we let them make use of the state resources to defend their lands. They claim that neighboring states are making incursions and raids into the land they control and that the only efficient way to defend them is to put some of our troops directly under their command.
translation: 一些重要的部落酋领前来要求我们,允许他们使用国家资源来守护他们的土地.他们声称邻国劫掠了他们的土地,而要抗击劫掠就只能派出军队,并由他们直接指挥.

original: Of course they shall have our men!
translation: 他们当然能使用我们的军队!

original: This is an excuse to weaken us!
translation: 这不是削弱国家势力的借口!

original: Several leaders of the powerful $ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$ in our country have approached the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to complain about the unfair interference of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] representatives. The $ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$ feel they should be left alone in accordance with their ancient rights.
translation: 在我国一些实力强大的$ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$酋领前来跟[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]抱怨说[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的安排不公平.$ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$感觉他们应该依照他们古代的权利而享有更多自由

original: We must leave them alone then.
Every Province owned by the §YTribes§! Estate will gain §R40§! Autonomy.
translation: §Y部落§!治下的每个省份将获得§R40§!自治度.

original: We can tolerate no states within our state!
translation: 我们不能忍受国中之国!

original: The $ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$ feel that the talents of their generals are wasted on our armies and have demanded that their leaders be sent home to marshal their own troops. As we rely on them for most military matters this will result in quite a strain on our remaining leadership.
translation: $ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$觉得他们的将领十分有能力,留在我们军队简直浪费.因而要求他们的将领回到他自己的部落领导他们的军队.但我们在军务上也十分依赖这位将领,答应这样的要求会造成我们领导阶层的损失.

original: They will do no such thing!

Good relations need to be maintained. As their numbers grow and some of the leaders of the $ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$ grow older our warm relations have grown colder. We need to make arrangements with the current breed of chiefs in order to be sure of their loyalty.
translation: 好的关系需要被维系.随着$ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$首领数目的增加和年龄的衰老，我们原来十分热络的关系变得越发冷淡.我们必须尽快和他们定下新的协议来维系他们的忠诚.

original: We have attempted to return to our roots and rule our lands according to what we imagine was the way of the great Genghis Khan and his contemporaries. Some would call this backward, we call it proper.
translation: 我们尝试回归到传统的的方法去统治我们的土地，沿着伟大的成吉思汗和他的同辈走过的老路。有人说这是倒退，我们认为这是正确的。

original: The $ESTATE_CHURCH$ has long been one of the foremost pillars of the [Root.GetAdjective] realm, providing not only spiritual guidance but also administrators, judges and diplomats for the benefit of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. In return for these great services no ecclesiastical manor, monastery or other estate pay any taxes to the state and the temporal authorities do not meddle in the internal affairs of the $ESTATE_CHURCH$.\nTimes grow dire, however, and the state has to cover an increasing number of expenses. Suggestions that perhaps the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ might make a voluntary contribution have not been favorably received.
translation: $ESTATE_CHURCH$已然成为[Root.GetAdjective]国内最重要的支柱之一,不仅提供精神导师,还提供行政人员,法官和外交官,对[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]而言裨益良多. 为了回报这些为国服务的人群,教会堂区,僧侣或其他教士人员都免除赋税,并保证不干预$ESTATE_CHURCH$的事务.\n然随着时间推移,国家则不得不负上越来越多的花销.提议$ESTATE_CHURCH$需要自愿捐助的决定并未获得赞同.

original: Make it clear that they need to contribute.
translation: 弄清楚他们需要捐献的.

original: We will find the money elsewhere.
translation: 我们会另找生钱的地方.

original: The $ESTATE_CHURCH$ has long been one of the foremost pillars of the [Root.GetAdjective] realm, providing not only spiritual guidance but also administrators, judges and diplomats for the benefit of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. In return for these great services many donations have been made over the years, both by the state and by others, in the form of villages to support the Brahman communities. These Brahmadeyas have over the centuries made our $ESTATE_CHURCH$ quite rich.\nTimes grow dire, however, and the state has to cover an increasing number of expenses. Suggestions that perhaps the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ might make a voluntary contribution have not been favorably received.
translation: $ESTATE_CHURCH$已然成为[Root.GetAdjective]国内最重要的支柱之一，不仅提供精神指引，还提供行政人员、法官、外交官，对我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]而言，实在是裨益良多。为了回报这些为国服务的人群，这些年来国家和大众已经给予了大量的捐助支持这些婆罗门村社。如此数个世纪以来，这些$ESTATE_CHURCH$便将变得十分富有。\n然而随着时间推移，国家则不得不负上越来越多的花销。提议$ESTATE_CHURCH$需要自愿捐助的决定并未获得赞同。

original: The $ESTATE_CHURCH$ has long been one of the foremost pillars of the [Root.GetAdjective] realm, providing not only spiritual guidance but also administrators, judges and diplomats for the benefit of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. In return for these great services many donations have been made over the years, both by the state and by others, to the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ and the gods they serve. These gifts have over the centuries made the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ quite rich and influential.\nTimes grow dire, however, and the state has to cover an increasing number of expenses. Suggestions that perhaps the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ might make a voluntary contribution have not been favorably received.
translation: $ESTATE_CHURCH$已然成为[Root.GetAdjective]国内最重要的支柱之一，不仅提供精神指引，还提供行政人员、法官、外交官，对我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]而言，实在是裨益良多。为了回报这些为国服务的人群，这些年来国家和大众已经给予了大量的捐助，供养了$ESTATE_CHURCH$和他们伺奉的神明。如此数个世纪以来，这些$ESTATE_CHURCH$变得十分富有且具影响力。\n然而随着时间推移，国家则不得不负上越来越多的花销。提议$ESTATE_CHURCH$需要自愿捐助的决定并未获得赞同。

original: The $ESTATE_CHURCH$ have always been the foremost pillars of the [Root.GetAdjective] realm, providing not only spiritual guidance but also administrators, judges and diplomats for the benefit of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. In return for these great services many lands have been set aside as religious properties, exempt from most of our taxes. This way the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ and the many fine projects they support can be provided for.\nTimes grow dire, however, and the state has to cover an increasing number of expenses. Suggestions that perhaps the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ might make a voluntary contribution have not been favorably received.
translation: $ESTATE_CHURCH$已然成为[Root.GetAdjective]国内最重要的支柱之一，不仅提供精神指引，还提供行政人员、法官、外交官，对我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]而言，实在是裨益良多。为了回报这些为国服务的人群，我们给与了很多土地作为教会资产，并豁免了税赋。通过这种馈赠方式,$ESTATE_CHURCH$能给我们提供更多的支援。\n然而随着时间推移，国家则不得不负上越来越多的花销。提议$ESTATE_CHURCH$需要自愿捐助的决定并未获得赞同。

original: The $ESTATE_CHURCH$ has long been one of the foremost pillars of the [Root.GetAdjective] realm, providing not only spiritual guidance but also administrators, judges and diplomats for the benefit of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. In return for these great services many donations have been made over the years, both by the state and by others, to the $ESTATE_CHURCH$. These gifts have over the centuries made the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ quite rich and influential.\nTimes grow dire, however, and the state has to cover an increasing number of expenses. Suggestions that perhaps the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ might make a voluntary contribution have not been favorably received.
translation: $ESTATE_CHURCH$已然成为[Root.GetAdjective]国内最重要的支柱之一，不仅提供精神指引，还提供行政人员、法官、外交官，对我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]而言，实在是裨益良多。为了回报这些为国服务的人群，这些年来国家和大众已经给予$ESTATE_CHURCH$大量的捐助。这些馈赠使$ESTATE_CHURCH$变得十分富有且具影响力。\n然而随着时间推移，国家则不得不负上越来越多的花销。提议$ESTATE_CHURCH$需要自愿捐助的决定并未获得赞同。

original: The $ESTATE_CHURCH$ have long been one of the foremost pillars of the [Root.GetAdjective] realm, providing not only spiritual guidance but also administrators, law scholars and diplomats for the benefit of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. In return for these great services many donations have been made over the years, both by the state and by others, to the great $ESTATE_CHURCH$ and their extensive land properties. These gifts have over the centuries made the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ quite rich and influential.\nTimes grow dire, however, and the state has to cover an increasing number of expenses. Suggestions that perhaps the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ might make a voluntary contribution have not been favorably received.
translation: $ESTATE_CHURCH$已然成为[Root.GetAdjective]国内最重要的支柱之一，不仅提供精神指引，还提供行政人员、法官、外交官，对我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]而言，实在是裨益良多。为了回报这些为国服务的人群，这些年来国家和大众已经给予$ESTATE_CHURCH$大量的捐助以及昂贵的地产。如此数个世纪以来，这些$ESTATE_CHURCH$变得十分富有且具影响力。\n然而随着时间推移，国家则不得不负上越来越多的花销。提议$ESTATE_CHURCH$需要自愿捐助的决定并未获得赞同。

original: The power of the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ has never relied on the state itself. Rather it is in many ways the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ who through their ties to the spiritual realm lend their legitimacy to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. A combination of deft political maneuvering, perceived bad omens and generous donations from our subjects have lately cemented the power of this estate.
translation: $ESTATE_CHURCH$的势力永不依赖其国家本身. 在很多方面$ESTATE_CHURCH$是连接上帝之城的纽带,是证明[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]合法性的存在.他们通过灵活的政治操纵力结合末世预言,使我们的臣民慷慨地捐赠,从而凝聚成一股势力.

original: More than any other Estate the influence of the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ is dependent on their standing with the common man. It has been hard to put the finger at exactly why but over the recent years the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ has come to be seen less as the spiritual guardians of our country and more as rich and corrupted intrigue-makers. Combined with some unfortunate investments in the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ properties themselves and poor political maneuvering the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ have been losing both power and influence.
translation: 与其他任何一个阶层相比，$ESTATE_CHURCH$的影响力依赖于他们在普通人中的地位。而近年来$ESTATE_CHURCH$本身越发难插手到国家事务中,因为他们已经变得越发腐朽且虚伪弄权，而再非精神领袖。再加上用$ESTATE_CHURCH$的财产去失策的投资以及失败的政治手段，已然把$ESTATE_CHURCH$ 的权力与影响力败光了。

original: The $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ of several prominent cities are accusing the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ of being greedy and indolent. The pious commoners are now withholding the tithe in a protest against a particularly bad example of misuse of the authority of the $ESTATE_CHURCH$. Pious $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ are now objecting to paying tithes to the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ as they consider the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ unfit to receive them.\nThe $ESTATE_CHURCH$ are furious and demand that we fine the obstinate $ESTATE_BURGHERS$.
translation: 由$ESTATE_BURGHERS$占主导的一些城市，有人指控$ESTATE_CHURCH$贪婪怠惰。虔诚的民众现在拒交什一税，抗议$ESTATE_CHURCH$阶层滥用权力的一个坏典型；同样虔诚的$ESTATE_BURGHERS$现在也拒绝给$ESTATE_CHURCH$交付什一税，他们认为$ESTATE_CHURCH$不配收这笔钱。\n$ESTATE_CHURCH$十分的愤怒，并且要求我们去处罚顽固的$ESTATE_BURGHERS$。

original: Then we must force them to pay!
translation: 必须强迫他们交付什一税！

original: A mild reprimand will be enough.

Relations between the state and the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ has now sunk low enough that it is entirely characterized by distrust and even open defiance. The Holy Places of our nation are centers of resistance to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and most of the faithful in our lands are doubting the legitimacy of our rule.\nWith things as they are it comes as no surprise that all it took for the situation to ignite was one small misstep by our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] during a religious ceremony last week. The peasants are now rising all over our country with the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ inciting them and directing their anger towards us.
translation: 我们与$ESTATE_CHURCH$之间的关系已降至冰点,他们已经完全不信任而且公开蔑视我们.我国的宗教圣所成为了抵抗[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的中心,甚至大多数虔诚的教众都在质疑我们的统治权威.\n但激怒他们从而造成所有的这一切,只不过是由于我们敬爱的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]在上周的宗教庆典上犯了一次小小失误.现在$ESTATE_CHURCH$在我国大范围地煽动起农民,把他们把怒火直接指向我们.

original: While none would openly defy the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ there are few states where they are as influential as in [Root.GetName]. There isn't a single institution in our country that isn't entirely under the influence of the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ and the power of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] depends on them now more than ever.\nIt is perhaps only natural that the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ now also wishes to take a more active role in the practical ruling of our country. Lately a number of suggestions have been made by their representatives to further harmonize our laws and traditions with those of the spiritual realm. The ambition is to cleanse our court culture from any unorthodoxy and to ensure that the country is governed according to religiously sound rules and ideals.
translation: 现在没有人再公然反抗$ESTATE_CHURCH$，在[Root.GetName]几乎没有哪个州的$ESTATE_CHURCH$不是最有影响力的。现在在我国，没有一个机构不受$ESTATE_CHURCH$的影响，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的权力比任何时候都更依赖于他们。\n这时候的$ESTATE_CHURCH$也是理所当然地希望更深度地参与到我国事务中，并更实际地掌控国家。所以$ESTATE_CHURCH$中的代表提了不少意见说，他们应用他们的教义有效协调我国的法律与传统。他们的野心是要让我们的文化把任何异端净化，并确保国家受到宗教法的规范。

original: While many rulers can rely on the support of the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ few have as strong supporters as we do. A long tradition of close cooperation and loyalty between us and $ESTATE_CHURCH$ has resulted in a situation where the Church thinks of itself as a part of the state administration rather than an independent actor. Throughout our state the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ are spreading the word of the excellence and spiritual strength of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 尽管很多的统治者都能依仗$ESTATE_CHURCH$的支持但几乎没有人能够获得像我们所拥有的这样强力的支持者。我们与$ESTATE_CHURCH$长期的紧密合作的传统和忠诚，使得教会阶级认为他们已然成为国家行政机构的一部分并扮演着独立的角色。在我们全国各地，$ESTATE_CHURCH$用美好的语言宣扬着[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的伟大。

original: Many land donations are quite old and while they are always written down both landscape and names may well have changed since a donation was originally written. Recently the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ have been accusing several members of the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ of outright land theft in the form of encroaching on lands donated to the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ long ago. The $ESTATE_NOBLES$ on the other hand argue that it is the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ who are trying to seize land areas they do not own.\nWhoever we decide to side with will become the majority land holder in the area.
translation: 很多关于土地的苛捐杂税的收取历史都十分的陈旧，然而他们总会变换名目以继续征收着。近来，$ESTATE_CHURCH$控诉几名$ESTATE_NOBLES$人士是彻头彻尾的国土大盗，他们长久以来用征收土地税为理由侵占$ESTATE_CHURCH$的土地。而$ESTATE_NOBLES$的人士则争辩，$ESTATE_CHURCH$只是想扩大他们自己的圈地范围。\n不论真正归属如何，最终都要由我们决定这块土地的拥有者。

original: There has always been some discrepancy between the religion actually taught and defended by the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ and the actual faith of the people in the provinces. Most of the time the differences are small enough that the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ chooses to ignore them to instead focus on reinforce the more orthodox spiritual ideas of the people.\nIt seems, however, that certain ideas that are quite unorthodox, if rooted in old traditions, have begun to spread together with the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith among our non-[Root.Religion.GetName] subjects. The resulting mix of old heathen ideas, popular superstitions and the actual [Root.Religion.GetName] itself has been quite too much for the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ to stomach even if it seems to have made conversion a much more attractive proposition for our heathen subjects.
translation: 在各省份中，人们所真正信仰的宗教与$ESTATE_CHURCH$所教导与捍卫的宗教，实际上是有差异的。很多时候，这些差异都十分细微，所以$ESTATE_CHURCH$大多选择忽视他们，而更注重加强人民的正统精神观念。\n似乎正是这些虽然看上去确实不太正统的理念，开始在我们非[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰的臣民中传播[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰，就像植根在了传统文化中一样。结果这个古老异教思想、流行迷信和真正[Root.Religion.GetName]本身的混合产物，即便它似乎更能吸引异教臣民改变信仰，但也已经超出了$ESTATE_CHURCH$所能容忍的极限。

original: Attempt to root out this syncretism.
translation: 尝试去根除这种宗教合一主义。

original: Better let this run its course.

The time has come for the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ to appoint a new leader to assist our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] in the capital. The likely candidate is an old cleric with a solid history as a prominent member of the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ behind him. He has, however, also acquired many enemies during his life who now hope to see a somewhat younger candidate with a less ugly past be appointed. As [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] it would not be hard to influence this election to the younger candidate who would likely be more loyal. To be seen to meddle in the affairs of the $ESTATE_CHURCH$, however, would very likely weaken the faction in the long run.
translation: 又到了$ESTATE_CHURCH$指派一名新的领袖来首都辅佐[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的时候。可能的候选人是一名年迈的教士，他有可靠的履历、杰出的能力，$ESTATE_CHURCH$是他坚实的后盾。但同时他这一生也树敌颇多，所以一些人更希望挑选一个更年轻的、黑历史更少的候选人来担任这个职务。[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]可以轻易地影响选举，把权利交给更忠诚的年轻候选人。然而，从长远来看，干涉$ESTATE_CHURCH$的事务很可能会削弱这一派系。

original: Do not meddle in the affairs of the $ESTATE_CHURCH$.
In response to the reduction of property of the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ the people of the province have risen up to protect the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ from our soldiers.
translation: 作为对削夺$ESTATE_CHURCH$财产的回应，该省的人民已经起义，保护$ESTATE_CHURCH$，对抗我们的军队。

original: Good relations need to be maintained. As their numbers grow and some of the leaders of the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ grow older our warm relations have grown colder. We need to make arrangements with the current breed of $ESTATE_CHURCH$ in order to be sure of their loyalty.
translation: 好的关系需要被维系。随着$ESTATE_CHURCH$首领数目的增加和年龄的衰老，我们原来十分热络的关系变得越发冷淡。我们必须尽快和 $ESTATE_CHURCH$定下新的协议来维系他们的忠诚.

original: Many of the families of the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ won their current position due to the actions of a forefather who served the state in times of war. For most of their sons a life in the field is therefore the only imaginable career. With the modernization of the army, however, common officers are no longer entirely unusual. Members of the Nobility have now approached us asking that we guarantee what they feel is the given right of their class. No man should be able to take service as a commander in the [Root.GetAdjective] armies who is not of noble birth!
translation: 许多$ESTATE_NOBLES$家族能赢得了他们现在的地位靠的是他们祖辈战争时期报效国家。因此对大多数他们的子辈来说，戎马一生也就是唯一可以想象的毕生职业。但随着军队的现代化，军队的士官已不再如以前一样。而这些贵族成员却要求我们保证他们阶层的权利，禁止非贵族血统的人成为[Root.GetAdjective]军队的士官!

original: Guarantee their right to command our armies.
translation: 保证他们控制我国军队的权利。

original: We cannot commit to such promises.
translation: 我们不能给予这样的保证。

original: The state is not the sole source of influence in our country. Over the last few decades a charismatic champion of the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ has successfully managed to increase the power of the leading families of the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ over most of the institutions of our country.\nContacts and privileges can be powerful things, especially combined with ambition.
translation: 国家不是我国唯一的影响力来源。在过去的几十年里，一位天赋异禀的$ESTATE_NOBLES$领袖成功地提升了主要的$ESTATE_NOBLES$家族在我国大多数机构中的权力。\n人脉和特权能构成庞然大物，特别是与野心相结合的时候。

original: It's hard to monitor everyone everywhere all the time and the boundaries between individual land properties are often grounded in old traditions or documents written when the landscape may have looked quite different. For someone with the right resources this can be exploited. A number of prominent $ESTATE_NOBLES$ families have used their considerable influence in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] to get away with expanding their properties considerably. If we want to protect the property of the state we must act soon.
translation: 我们很难全天候地监控每个地方的每一个人，更何况是每个人的土地财产，这些土地的拥有形式通常会因为不同的老旧传统或土地文件而变得千奇百怪。所以有些有合法资源的人会被剥削。许多$ESTATE_NOBLES$的豪门望族已经利用他们在[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]巨大的影响力相当程度地扩大了他们的地产。如果我们想保护国家财产，就必须赶紧采取行动。

original: Demand that the land be returned.

A representative of the people living in an area dominated by one of the most prominent families of the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ has approached the throne today imploring the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to take action against what he claims are systematic abuses of power against the people there. As the ruler of [Root.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has a responsibility to protect his people, not doing so will make us appear weak and may harm the long-term growth of the province. The $ESTATE_NOBLES$ would likely not take kindly to chastising such a powerful member of their ranks however.
translation: 一个$ESTATE_NOBLES$大家族主宰的地区的人民代表今天走近王座，恳求[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]采取措施查处那些据称在他居住地区故意虐待臣民的事件。作为[Root.GetName]的统治者，[Root.Monarch.GetName]有责任保护自己的人民，否则就会使我们显得软弱，也可能损害该省的长期发展。但$ESTATE_NOBLES$可能不愿意他们行列中这样一个强有力的家族被惩戒。

original: As both influential land owners and the traditional warrior class in our state the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ have not fared well lately. Through a combination of excessive infighting and poorly coordinated power plays the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ have lost influence in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] and many have retired to their properties in the countryside.
translation: $ESTATE_NOBLES$在我国既是有影响力的地主，又是传统的武士阶级，但他们最近的日子并不好过。由于过度的内部争斗和不协调的权力博弈，$ESTATE_NOBLES$失去了在[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的影响力，许多人已经退休到农村的地产去了。
$ESTATE_NOBLES$要求颁布更严格的奢侈品禁令

original: Expensive clothes, great banquettes and impressive palaces are some of the most visible symbols of the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ but the degree to which one family has money to spend on such things can vary greatly. In some cases the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ of our country are able to spend just as lavishly if not more so than the average noble. While there are old rules and traditions restricting such things for those of less noble birth these are hard to enforce efficiently. This is unacceptable to the powerful $ESTATE_NOBLES$ of our country who are now demanding that we update our laws on what an outsider can and cannot wear. They now suggest a number of heavy fines for anyone trying to rise visibly above their betters.
translation: 昂贵的服饰、漂亮的长椅、华美的宫殿是装饰$ESTATE_NOBLES$的标志，尽管不同家族的承受能力有别。可是有时，我国$ESTATE_BURGHERS$甚至比得上一般贵族那样奢侈。尽管传统旧规不允许这些非贵族僭越，但这些规定难以有效执行。而现在一些十分强大的$ESTATE_NOBLES$看不惯这种风气，上书我们更新我们的法度，以规定衣冠之得当。他们更建议配合上重罚，法规才能有效实施。

original: Bend to the wishes of the $ESTATE_NOBLES$.

In time many of the everyday occurrences in the life of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] predecessors has become the subject of ceremony. Being able to attend the bedroom of the ruler as [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] dresses for instance is considered by many to be the best way to gain the ear of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. An elaborate court life will certainly limit the power of our nobles to plot against us in their countryside properties but it could also prove quite expensive. Denying them the right to be part of the daily life of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] entirely on the other hand would also limit their influence but the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ would likely resent it.
translation: 在很多时候,我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]与先君一样,他也喜欢举办宴会.在卧室中,[Root.Monarch.GetTitle],穿上能从最好的途径所获得的最好的衣服,从而才出席宴会.一个规范而灵活的宫廷规范,能够限制与我们作对的贵族在他们地产上势力.而巧夺他们的权力同时限制他们的影响里,也成为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的生活的一部分,但也引来了$ESTATE_NOBLES$的反感.

original: Let's keep it at a modest level.
translation: 还是把这些弄得稍温和点.

original: An elaborate and lengthy ceremony for the most influential.
translation: 一场繁杂而冗长的仪式,是最富有影响力的.

original: We have no need of such things.

Relations between the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ and the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] could hardly be worse. The great sense of distrust is plainly visible by the almost deserted court in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] as most prominent families keep to their countryside manors. Unless we do something soon state authority will deteriorate in the areas controlled by the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ but any demands from the state will likely be met with arms in hand at this point.
translation: $ESTATE_NOBLES$与[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]之间的关系降至冰点. 双方极度的不信任关系,已经让原本热衷于参与[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的宫廷生活的人们,渐行渐远.除非我们放松对$ESTATE_NOBLES$所控制的领地的监管,但国家的所有需求都必须满足资源集中的原则.

original: Force them to accept state authority.
translation: 强迫他们接受国家权威的管理.

original: None of our subjects are more associated with war than the $ESTATE_NOBLES$. Generations ago their families served us or the states before us and won their current status on the field of battle. Ever since then most of them have kept their old traditions alive, training for a life in the field and making connections with others of the same inclination.\nThe current state of affairs in our country, however, has left us with few members of the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ willing to fight our battles. Insubordination has become widespread among the higher officers and we have good reason to suspect more than a few hope for an unsuccessful war.
translation: 我国臣民之中,没有一个会像$ESTATE_NOBLES$如此热衷战争.因为他们的家祖,是靠着征战沙场而获得现在地位.从那时候起,他们便维持着这赖以生存的传统,把生命当作战场,把社交当作战友联谊.\n然而现在的情况是,只有很少的$ESTATE_NOBLES$愿意跟随我们征战.这种不服从命令的想法依然遍及我们的高层军官之中,我们有理由相信照这样下去我们将无法获得胜利.

original: It is high time we replaced them with men of true ability.
translation: 现在是时候用一个真正有能力的人来替代他们了.

original: It is high time we replaced them with men we can trust.
translation: 现在是时候用一个能信任的人来替代他们了.

original: Let us consult the Brahmins, some of these learned men are clearly fit to lead.
translation: 我们来咨询一下婆罗门,他们中的一些博学之人或许能够成为领导.

original: As the state and its bureaucracy grow there is an ever-growing need of people to oversee and administrate various lands and functions. The $ESTATE_NOBLES$ have traditionally been more associated with military services to the state but have increasingly made it clear that they still expect to be first in line when government offices are being handed out. The $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ on the other hand claim that the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ considers such appointments as mere rewards and will use them only to enrich themselves. Instead the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ argue we should appoint men out of individual merit.\nThe unexpected death of a trusted secretary has left a vacant position to be filled at the center of this conflict, with the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ supporting one candidate and the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ expecting us to pick another. While both candidates are talented men this has to be a political decision.
translation: 随着国家和官僚体系的发展，越来越多的人民需要监管，各种职能各种土地也需要管理。而$ESTATE_NOBLES$在传统上专门为国家征战，但也逐渐地被政府行政人员从第一线中取代。另一方面，$ESTATE_BURGHERS$又声称$ESTATE_NOBLES$考虑的只是如何用军职牟利。相反，$ESTATE_BURGHERS$要求我们任命人员时候应该任人唯能。\n然而一位重臣的意外离世让一重要职位瞬间空缺，$ESTATE_BURGHERS$推选了的候选人，同时$ESTATE_NOBLES$也有一个。然而两个候选人，选谁都是政治的选择。

original: With a great pedigree come great abilities.
Self-made men are what we need to run this country.
translation: 自学成才的人才是我们需要的栋梁之才。

original: Let us turn to the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ instead.
Let us turn to the $ESTATE_DHIMMI$ instead.

The $ESTATE_NOBLES$ have a long tradition of service to the state both as military leaders or more recently as dependable administrators. In a state where the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ are as strongly entrenched and loyal as ours this means that from time to time nobles of great talent and loyalty will emerge to lead the country to greatness.
translation: $ESTATE_NOBLES$拥有长久的义务传统，作为军事领导人或最近作为可靠的行政官员。在我国$ESTATE_NOBLES$忠诚而势力深远，这意味着不时会出现拥有伟大才华与忠诚的贵族，并带领国家走向伟大。

original: The $ESTATE_NOBLES$ are refusing to accept the confiscation of their property in [Root.GetName] and have risen in revolt against us!
translation: $ESTATE_NOBLES$拒绝接受将他们的财产收归[Root.GetName]的名下，并举旗叛乱来反抗我们！

original: Good relations need to be maintained. As their numbers grow and some of the leaders of the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ grow older our warm relations have grown colder. We need to make arrangements with the current breed of $ESTATE_NOBLES$ in order to be sure of their loyalty.
translation: 好的关系需要被维系.原本关系热络的$ESTATE_NOBLES$变得越发冷淡.我们需要和他们达成新的协议来维系他们的忠诚.

original: The status of the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ does not rest on the same old traditions as that of the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ or the $ESTATE_CHURCH$. Instead they have had to make their own fortunes by working diligently and then risking the profit to again expand their businesses. As a rule, however, this has gone very well for them lately. While not as prestigious business is in many ways the backbone of our economy and through their control of the coins the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ have managed to increase their power over our country.
translation: $ESTATE_BURGHERS$的义务传统不同于$ESTATE_NOBLES$或$ESTATE_CHURCH$.他们必须用勤劳的双手或者商业上的冒险精神才能获得财富.然而直到最近统治者才对他们有所亲近.虽然我国还没形成有规模的商业成为我们的经济支柱,但通过对货币的控制$ESTATE_BURGHERS$已然渐渐成为我国的一股势力.

original: The $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ are concerned with the great influence of the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ in our state. They claim that many lower members of the nobility are disregarding the peace and law of the land, using their position of power and the lands they hold to take up unreasonable tolls and taxes for traders passing by. Some are even said to attack and waylay merchants, robbing or extorting them of their money.\nRepresentatives of the [Root.GetAdjective] $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ now claim that the economic development of our country is held back by these excesses. The $ESTATE_NOBLES$ on the other hand argue that they are simply charging reasonably for the use of their roads property. Some are willing to give the state a part of the share they take.
translation: $ESTATE_BURGHERS$对$ESTATE_NOBLES$在我国具有巨大影响力感到担忧。他们声称很多下层贵族成员不顾国家的法律，滥用他们的权力在土地上无理征收税金及行商的过路费。有些甚至被指控袭击商人，通过抢劫与勒索来夺取钱财。\n以[Root.GetAdjective]为代表的$ESTATE_BURGHERS$现在称我国的经济发展会因为这些恶习而受阻。而$ESTATE_NOBLES$则说，他们只是合理的运用他们对道路的权利。一些贵族也愿意与国家分享这部分收入。

original: They only take what is their right.
translation: 好吧，他们只是合理运用他们的权利。
我们必须制止这些恶行！

original: Without the old privileges and pedigrees of other factions the status and influence of the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ is rarely quite as secure as that of those born into power. Lately a combination of financial misfortune and misdirected political ambitions have resulted in a loss of power and influence for the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ of [Root.GetName].
translation: 没有了既有的特权与家族派系，$ESTATE_BURGHERS$以其影响力和地位是很难在那些天横贵胄之中独善其身。加上失败的投资和失控的政治野心结合，导致了[Root.GetName]的$ESTATE_BURGHERS$丧失其影响力和权力。
发展中的城市要求特权

original: The $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ of an increasingly important trading city have approached the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] today asking to be granted privileges to be able to make the region thrive without the hindrance of many of our normal taxes. Should we provide them with these means to grow they assure us that the economy of the area would quickly improve, resulting in more wealth for the state.
translation: 一座越发重要的贸易城市中的$ESTATE_BURGHERS$今天前来拜会[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，请求赋予他们特权免除正常赋税，以促进城市的发展。如果我们答应他们的要求，他们保证当地的经济将会迅速发展，并让我们事实上能够获取更多财富。

original: Grain prices are notoriously unstable, anything from the weather where it is grown to incidents hurting its distribution can suddenly cause the price to rise significantly. As a result of one such sudden change there is currently an acute shortage of grain in many of our larger cities. Desperate to feed themselves the common people are directing their anger at the merchants who they feel are making good use of this situation to overcharge for their wares. The merchants themselves on the other hand claim that this is a natural result of the shortage and that there simply isn't enough bread to go around.
translation: 谷物价格的不稳定性臭名昭著——从产地的天气到物流的意外，什么都能让价格猛然暴涨。当下的一场价格波动迅速榨干了我国许多大城市的粮仓。饿肚子的老百姓迁怒于贸易商，他们认为这些商人在趁机牟取暴利。另一方面，商人们则表示这是货源短缺的必然结果，而且根本就没有足够的面包供市场流转。

original: Force the Merchants to lower their prices.
We should not meddle in these things.
translation: 我们不应该介入这些事。

original: We must pay for and distribute what bread there is.
translation: 我们必须买下能买到的所有面包，分配给民众。

original: The $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ are not the sole authority within their cities, the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ also have a strong presence in most big cities going back to their initial founding. Conflicts sometimes arise when the councils of the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ implement rules that the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ disapprove of.\nSuch conflicts have become more and more commonplace and members of the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ are openly acting in defiance of the various rules the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ have agreed upon in their cities. Delegates from various $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ dominated cities are now urging us to clarify the situation.
translation: $ESTATE_BURGHERS$并不是城市中唯一的势力，$ESTATE_CHURCH$从他们建立之初，就在众多大城市里有着巨大影响力。而每当城市议会召开时，$ESTATE_BURGHERS$经常会和$ESTATE_CHURCH$因为意见不合而激发冲突。\n而冲突的越发普遍，让$ESTATE_CHURCH$开始公然蔑视$ESTATE_BURGHERS$在城市中同意过的规则。因此$ESTATE_BURGHERS$的众多代表前来迫切要求我们处理这种情况。

original: The $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ feel that they are unduly taxed and regulated when taking in mind the great importance of their work for our country. Tolls, taxes and various tariffs are holding them back from being able to accomplish even greater things and they will not hesitate to use all of their influence to abolish them.
translation: 当$ESTATE_BURGHERS$考虑到他们在国家事务上的重要性时，感到自己受到了过度的征税和管制。因此他们决定毫不犹豫地用他们的影响力把阻碍他们实现更伟大的目标的一切——如通行费、税赋及各种关税——给通通废除。
把苛捐杂税都废除了吧!

original: The $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ need to know their place!

The interests of prominent merchant households are being hurt by our repressive trade policies towards other countries. The $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ support these families and have now petitioned us to compensate them by at least opening up some other restrictions on trade to compensate for their loss of income.
translation: 由于我们对别国颁布了打压性的贸易政策，杰出的商人团掌握的利益受了到损害。$ESTATE_BURGHERS$阶级支持这些大家族，请求我们至少放开贸易禁令，以赔偿他们的收入损失。

original: We cannot let our trade policy be decided by these peddlers.
translation: 我国的商业政策不会因为商人的干预而改变。

original: Economic development is not always without conflict. It seems rich Merchants in some of our $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ dominated cities have been attempting to bypass various guild privileges by outsourcing work to the homes of families living outside the city. The fact that this 'Putting-out System' has been a very profitable strategy only further enflame the Artisans in the city who feel their ancient rights have been trampled and that the carefully managed prices of their products will suffer. The [Root.GetAdjective] artisans now turn to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to defend their privileges as the city councils has been unable to root out competition not based in the cities.
translation: 经济的发展总是充满竞争。就好像我国一些城市中，$ESTATE_BURGHERS$的富裕商人试图绕过行会的束缚，外包给城市外的家庭手工业进行生产。而事实上这种家庭包工制是十分有赚头的策略，但却极大的损害了住在城市中的行会工匠所既有的价格保护措施。[Root.GetAdjective]的行会工匠现在前来请求[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]保护他们的特权，以要求城市议会根除这种外包方式。

original: We cannot stand in the way of progress.
translation: 我们不能阻止这种进步。

original: We must safeguard the guild privileges.
translation: 我们必须保护行会的特权。

original: The growing power of the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ has led to individuals from within their ranks to seek their fortunes in areas traditionally dominated by other groups. The sons of mid to low prominence families of the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ now have the education and the ambition to match the more privileged classes and as a result an increasing number of them are now being employed as administrators, lawyers, officers as well as in other positions traditionally dominated by another estate. The $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ still feel they are being unduly held back by the archaic rights and privileges of another era but their adversaries are growing very weary of the current 'unnatural' social mobility.\nUnless we do something we risk losing the support of the privileged classes but if we withdraw our support of the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ at this point this will likely have grave effects on our relations with them.
translation: $ESTATE_BURGHERS$不断成长的力量，促使不断有这阶层的个人到其他团体或阶层占主导的地方上谋求生机。就连$ESTATE_BURGHERS$的中低阶层的家庭的孩子，也受过良好的教育以及相匹配的野心，能力也逐渐赶上旧有的特权阶层：从而他们赶走了特权阶层，越来越多地占据政府官员、律师、行政人员等职位。而$ESTATE_BURGHERS$依旧觉得他们被上一个时代的特权阶层所过度束缚，而那些特权阶层却非常厌倦当前「不自然」的社会流动性。\n除非我们做某些事情，否则我们可能会失去特权阶层的支持；但是如果我们此时撤消对$ESTATE_BURGHERS$的支持，则可能会对与他们的关系产生严重影响。

original: We must not stand in the way of these new men.
translation: 我们不能阻挡新兴阶层的发展。

original: We must protect the ancient rights of the other Estates.
translation: 我们必须保护特权阶层的既得权利。

original: Our policy of cooperation with the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ has come to bear fruit in the form of economic development in many fields. The cities of the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ are prospering and our influence in international trade is growing rapidly.
translation: 我们与$ESTATE_BURGHERS$相互合作的政策已经在许多领域的经济方面取得成果.同时$ESTATE_BURGHERS$正蓬勃发展,以及在国际贸易中发展得越发快速.

original: Trade over large distances can be risky, if profitable. The weather, brigands and pirates remain a threat on land as well as on water. Normally the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ can cope with a certain amount of mishaps and have their own ways to protect themselves and insure their cargo. Lately, however, things have been going badly for a large number of Merchant families and some are at risk of bankruptcy. It may be prudent to offer some financial compensation to get them back on their feet.
translation: 长距离贸易如果要获得盈利，是需要冒风险的。天气与海盗不亚于陆地上的威胁。通常$ESTATE_BURGHERS$能够应付一系列事故，以及用自己的方式保护自己以及货物。然而近来，大量的商人面临着破产的风险。或许我们应该在经济上给他们点补偿，让他们的生意重回正轨。

original: They knew what they were getting into.

While only a small portion of our population live in the cities the growing prosperity of the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ is attracting an increasing number of people from the countryside. Some cities are growing so quickly that existing problems in terms of sanitation and overcrowding have gone from troubling to catastrophic according to the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$. The poor have taken up residence outside the city walls where filthy suburbs have sprung up and disease thrives.\nThe $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ find the situation intolerable and are now requesting that the state step in to provide help both in terms of resources and enforcement of rules outside of the walls. Only this way can this increasing urbanization actually lead to something good.
translation: $ESTATE_BURGHERS$阶级愈发繁荣，吸引着越来越多乡下人涌入原本人口比例不高的城市中。一些城市快速发展，但伴随着卫生拥挤等问题，这会对$ESTATE_BURGHERS$造成困扰甚至灾难。穷人们居住在城墙之外，而肮脏的郊区出现了勃发的疾病。\n$ESTATE_BURGHERS$发现这种状况难以忍受，要求国家进一步提供对资源援助，并加强对城墙外的管理。只有这样做，才能在城市化的过程中带来好的影响。

original: This is nothing unusual, the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ can handle it.
translation: 这没什么大不了的，$ESTATE_BURGHERS$自己能处理好。

original: As the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ grow in power their calls for fewer trade regulations and taxes become more and more frequent. Many feel our country has an old-fashioned and repressive trade policy and that we would benefit from reducing the amount of taxes and tolls that hinder commerce.
translation: 随着$ESTATE_BURGHERS$权力的滋长，他们对降低政府控制力度与减少税收的要求变得越发频密。许多人认为我国的商业政策落后且充满压迫，如此以往，路费和税收将会因此而减少。

original: Refuse to change the Trade Policy.

The continuously deteriorating relationship between the state and the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ has reached the point where there is little trust at all for the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] in our major cities. Every state initiative is suspected at being aimed to contain the power of the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ and tax evasion has become widespread.\nIt has now come to the point that a number of guilds have begun a general strike, demanding greater autonomy and freedom from the overbearing state.
translation: 国家与$ESTATE_BURGHERS$之间不断恶化的关系已然触及冰点，以至于在主要城市中，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]根本不受信任。而国家的每个倡议都被怀疑是为了遏制$ESTATE_BURGHERS$的权力，偷税漏税也已成为普遍现象。\n现在，一些行会已经开始了大罢工，要求更多的自治权与自由。

original: Appalled at the loss of their privileges the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ of the [Root.GetName] province have taken up arms against us!
translation: 因惊恐于权益的损失，[Root.GetName]省份的$ESTATE_BURGHERS$拿起武器反抗我们！

original: Good relations need to be maintained. As their numbers grow and some of the leaders of the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ grow older our warm relations have grown colder. We need to make arrangements with the current breed of $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ leaders in order to be sure of their loyalty.
translation: 好的关系需要被维系。而原本关系十分热络的$ESTATE_BURGHERS$变得越发冷淡。我们必须尽快与$ESTATE_BURGHERS$的领导人定下新的协议以维系他们的忠诚。

original: The Qadi in one of our major cities has been using his influence to interpret Islamic law as well as the edicts of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] a bit too zealously. Not content to keep the status quo in the largely non-Muslim city he has been trying to actively force the non-believers to convert while systematically closing down their centers of worship.\nAfter a recent suicide by a force-converted trader non-Muslims are now leaving the city en masse to settle somewhere more welcoming. While even the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ largely seem to find these actions too extreme they would likely consider any action taken against the Qadi to be much worse.
translation: 我国一座主要城市中的卡迪（教法执行官）一直在运用自己的影响力来解释伊斯兰教法及[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]颁布的法令，只是未免狂热了些。他并不满足于在大多非穆斯林城市里维持现状，而是一直试图积极地迫使非信徒皈依，同时有条不紊地关闭他们的礼拜中心。\n近期在一位被迫皈依的商人自杀后，非穆斯林现正在集体离开这座城市，去更受欢迎的地方定居。而且即使是$ESTATE_CHURCH$很大程度上似乎也发现这些行为过于极端，他们可能会考虑采取行动阻止这位变本加厉的卡迪。

original: Replace the Qadi and try to make amends.
translation: 把这位卡迪撤职，并试图修补关系。

original: Demands to lessen Taxes on Heathens
translation: 要求减轻异教徒的税赋

original: As our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] was on his way to the weekly procession to the royal Mosque a large number of $ESTATE_DHIMMI$ had assembled in front of the building, preventing the passage of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and demanding that some of the discriminatory taxes against non-Muslims such as the temple or pilgrimage taxes be revoked.
translation: 正当我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]前往王室清真寺进行每周游行的途中，大量的$ESTATE_DHIMMI$聚集在建筑之前，拦住了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的去路，并要求减轻某些对非穆斯林的歧视性税收，比如寺庙或者朝圣的税赋。

original: While not everyone may like it the non-Muslims in our realm have been growing in influence over the last few years. Members of the Dhimmi are frequently seen even among the more important Trade Guilds of our country and many serve as administrators in our provinces or have been allowed to keep their hereditary titles.
translation: 在过去的几年里，我们国家的非穆斯林越来越具有影响力，虽然并不是人人都喜欢这一点。即使是在我国比较重要的贸易行会上，也能经常看到这些齐米成员的身影，其中的许多人在我们国家的省份中担任行政长官，或是被允许保留他们的实习头衔。

original: While they make up an important part of our society the non-Muslims have lately been losing ground to other groups. They are regularly looked over for any type of government service, have to pay a number of discriminatory taxes and often see business deals going to their Muslim competitors.
translation: 虽然非穆斯林群体是我们社会的重要组成部分，但他们近来正在被其他阶层的群体重挫。他们经常性地被要求去履行一些政府事务，被迫去缴纳一些歧视性的税赋以及经常受到穆斯林商人在生意上的恶意阻挠。

original: Many among the Muslim $ESTATE_NOBLES$ have been voicing complaints at what they feel is an unjust and unfair favoring of infidels in our government. Having sought the support of the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ they now claim that we are running our country contrary to established Islamic customs and that we must ensure that the infidel are kept out of positions of influence.\nThe construction of a new shrine in a province largely dominated by the $ESTATE_DHIMMI$ entirely funded by local nobles and merchants has escalated the situation further with the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ and the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ demanding that we tear down the holy building and put the infidels in their place.
translation: 很多的穆斯林$ESTATE_NOBLES$声讨并抱怨我们的政府不够平等不够公正，反而有利于异教徒。在得到$ESTATE_CHURCH$的支持后，他们现在声称，我国正在违背既往的伊斯兰传统习俗，我们必须确保异教徒远离具有政治影响力的位置。\n在一个$ESTATE_DHIMMI$占主导的省份中，由本地贵族与商人完全资助了一座全新圣所的建造，此事却使局势越演越烈，$ESTATE_CHURCH$与$ESTATE_NOBLES$要求我们拆掉这座圣所，把异教徒赶回他们应在的地方。

original: Traditionally the $ESTATE_DHIMMI$ are excluded from service in many of the higher positions in the administration. Instead these are generally given to faithful Muslim literati. As our government apparatus grows, however, it has a constant thirst for more learned men and among the $ESTATE_DHIMMI$ there are many that would fit this description. While some would consider it unorthodox we could probably greatly benefit from recruiting from their numbers.
translation: 在传统上$ESTATE_DHIMMI$是被排除出高级行政人员的,取而任之的是那些虔诚的穆斯林文士.我们的政府机构发展得如此之快,因此职位空缺需要更多的人才,$ESTATE_DHIMMI$之中的更多文士应召而参与政治活动.然而有些人认为这些官员十分不正宗,我们或许能够从这些借口之中获得一些利益.

original: Let's put these learned men to good use.
translation: 好好活用这些异教徒文士吧.

original: We cannot risk their assimilative capabilities.
translation: 我们不能冒险吸收同化他们.

original: The quickly deteriorating relations between the state and the $ESTATE_DHIMMI$ have resulted in local relations breaking down entirely in some areas. Tax collectors tell tales of convoys vanishing on the route between areas dominated by the Dhimmi, together with what had been collected. In the cities the priests and leaders of the $ESTATE_DHIMMI$ agitate against us and it has become increasingly hard to keep track of our subjects even within the walls. Even those opposed to $ESTATE_DHIMMI$ influence now find that they question our ability to rule.
translation: 随着国家与$ESTATE_DHIMMI$的关系急剧恶化,从而导致了在一些地方对他们的信任关系完全地崩溃.而有些税吏告诉我们说,有一队运送税钱运输队在齐米阶层的地盘中消失了.在一些城市中,$ESTATE_DHIMMI$的领袖甚至还与祭司们进行激烈地对抗,并鼓动反对我们在城墙内把一切都隐藏起来.$ESTATE_DHIMMI$甚至还反对起我们的执政能力来.

original: Make concessions to alleviate the situation.

Throughout the Islamic world the term $ESTATE_DHIMMI$ has come to be applied to a wide and disparate variety of people. The traditional and more restrictive definition of only Christians and Jews has quickly been abandoned by Muslim states where the majority populations are Hindus or Buddhists. Regardless of who are included the $ESTATE_DHIMMI$ receive protection in exchange for being exempt from many of the laws of the realm.\nWhile this may seem unfortunate for them it is quite fortunate for us right now, while the general economy is currently still recovering from recent wars many families of the Dhimmi still hold quite large cash reserves and they have no laws or rules forbidding them from investing or lending it to others.
translation: 整个伊斯兰世界中$ESTATE_DHIMMI$的概念已经被运用到现在很多的人群身上.在传统上狭义是指基督徒和犹太人,有包括在伊斯兰国家占多数的印度教和佛教徒.不管$ESTATE_DHIMMI$这个概念包括了什么,总之这个阶层保护和豁免了许多新近征服的异教徒,逃避了我国的经济管理与法律管理.\n然而祸福焉能两全,虽这些巨大的社会财富能集中在齐米阶层之中,但他们也没有属于他们的法律或君主来保证他们的财产投资和贷款去向.

original: Convince the $ESTATE_DHIMMI$ to invest in economic recovery.
translation: 劝服这些$ESTATE_DHIMMI$投资国家的财政复苏计划中.

original: We must not make ourselves dependent on infidels.
translation: 我们还是远离这些异教徒吧.

original: Desperate to have their privileges redacted the Dhimmi of [Root.GetName] have taken up arms against us!
translation: 齐米阶层惊讶于特权被剥夺,[Root.GetName]的阶层皆举兵而反!

original: Good relations need to be maintained. As their numbers grow and some of the leaders of the $ESTATE_DHIMMI$ grow older our warm relations have grown colder. We need to make arrangements with the current breed of $ESTATE_DHIMMI$ leaders in order to be sure of their loyalty.
translation: 好的关系需要被维系.原本关系越发热络的$ESTATE_DHIMMI$变得越发冷淡.我们必须尽快和他们定下新的协议来维系他们的忠诚.

original: $MONARCH$ has allowed the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ of $COUNTRY$ to grow too powerful and now they have made their move. Exercising the wide range of privileges and rights granted to them, they have effectively seized the reins of government and turned the $MONARCHTITLE$ into little more than their puppet.
translation: $MONARCH$让$COUNTRY$的$ESTATE_NOBLES$变得十分强大,现在他们开始下一步动作.通过行使广泛的特权和权利,他们迅速的夺取在政府中的权力,让$MONARCHTITLE$成为他们的傀儡.

original: We should have seen this coming...
[Root.GetName] will now be controlled by the §YNobility§! until the §Y'Curtail the Nobility'§! decision is taken.
translation: 采用§Y「削弱贵族阶层」§!决议前[Root.GetName]将受§Y贵族§!阶层控制。

original: We have managed to limit the influence of the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ to tolerable levels. $ESTATE_NOBLES$ privileges have been revoked and their properties reduced. The $ESTATE_NOBLES$ themselves have grudgingly agreed that the $MONARCHTITLE$ is the undisputable leader of this country and the stamp formerly used by the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ in place of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] signature has been destroyed.
translation: 我们计划把$ESTATE_NOBLES$的权力限制在可容忍的等级中.$ESTATE_NOBLES$ 的特权被剥夺,财产被没收.$ESTATE_NOBLES$不得不勉强同意承认$MONARCHTITLE$是无可争议的国家统治者,以及以前$ESTATE_NOBLES$所用代替[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]签名的印章被销毁.

original: $MONARCH$ has allowed the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ of $COUNTRY$ to grow too powerful and now they have made their move. While keeping the common people in line through their ties with the divine the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ have used every one of the many means available to them to seize the reins of government. While still ruler in name our $MONARCHTITLE$ is now little more than their puppet.
translation: 在$MONARCH$的默许下，$COUNTRY$的$ESTATE_CHURCH$变得过于强大。$ESTATE_CHURCH$通过控制普通大众的精神纽带,从而夺取了对政府的控制。虽然他们依旧效忠我们,但是$MONARCHTITLE$俨然已经成为他们的傀儡。

original: We should have seen this coming...
[Root.GetName] will now be controlled by the §YClergy§! until the §Y'Curtail the Clergy'§! decision is taken.
translation: 采用§Y「削弱教士阶层」§!决议前[Root.GetName]将受§Y教士§!阶层控制。

original: Using a wide range of measures the $MONARCHTITLE$ has managed to strip the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ of the many offices they held and the properties under their control. The authority over the worldly realm lies once again in the hands of $MONARCH$.
translation: $MONARCHTITLE$暗度陈仓，最终成功将$ESTATE_CHURCH$控制的众多职务以及旗下财产收归国有。$MONARCH$掌握的世俗权威将再一次统治国家。

original: $MONARCH$ has allowed the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$ of $COUNTRY$ to grow too powerful and now they have made their move. Making use of their many hard-earned privileges as well as the many debts owed to them, they have effectively seized the reins of government and turned the $MONARCHTITLE$ into little more than their puppet.
translation: 在$MONARCH$的默许下，$COUNTRY$ 的$ESTATE_BURGHERS$变得过于强大,现在他们已经采取了下一步行动。依靠大范围的商业特权和收放高利贷,他们有效地掌握了政府的命脉,让$MONARCHTITLE$成为了他们的傀儡。

original: We should have seen this coming...
[Root.GetName] will now be controlled by the §YBurghers§! until the §Y'Curtail the Burghers'§! decision is taken.
translation: 采用§Y「削弱市民阶层」§!决议前[Root.GetName]将受§Y市民§!阶层控制。

original: We have finally managed to break our reliance on the $ESTATE_BURGHERS$, reclaiming control over all important state functions and reducing these peddlers to their rightful confines within the city walls.
translation: 我们最终收回了对$ESTATE_BURGHERS$的信任,并收紧控制所有重要的国家机构以及拉高对于商贩在城市内的行商的标准.

original: $MONARCH$ has allowed the $ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$ of $COUNTRY$ to grow too powerful and now they have made their move. Using the influence they already had over our state in terms of control over everything from tax collection to the directing and recruitment of our armies, they have effectively seized the reins of government and turned the $MONARCHTITLE$ into little more than their puppet.
translation: $MONARCH$被迫默许$COUNTRY$的$ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$发展成最强大势力,现在并采取他们的下一步行动.他们运用其影响力,控制了全国地区不论从接管税收再到军队招募,他们有效地勒紧了政府的缰绳,让$MONARCHTITLE$成为了他们的傀儡.

original: We should have seen this coming...
[Root.GetName] will now be controlled by the §YTribes§! until the §Y'Curtail the Tribes'§! decision is taken.
translation: 采用§Y「削弱部族」§!决议前[Root.GetName]将受§Y部族§!阶层控制。

original: After an arduous struggle the $ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$ have finally been brought in line again. [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is now in control over enough land, men and institutions to once again call [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] the ruler of our people.
translation: 经过一番艰苦卓越的斗争,$ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$最终被镇压.[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]现在又重新控制这片地区和人民.唤[Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]之名再次君临吾民.
齐米阶层挣脱出我们的统治
