original: $ESTATE_DHIMMI$ leaders have come to exercise such far-ranging authority over large areas of our state that it has now come to the point where the $MONARCHTITLE$ has had to accept that [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] no longer has any practical control over them. With the crowning of a leader of their own the transition is complete and our loss of authority over the $ESTATE_DHIMMI$ total.
translation: $ESTATE_DHIMMI$的领袖们在我国已在相当范围内有很高的权威,这权威使得$MONARCHTITLE$不得不接受[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] 已不再对他们有任何实际的控制权这个事实。他们自封的统治者的加冕,标志着我们对$ESTATE_DHIMMI$的控制已经完全丧失。

original: We should have seen this coming...

$MONARCH$ has allowed the Cossacks of $COUNTRY$ to grow too powerful and now they have made their move. Their great influence over the Steppes as well as over many matters in [Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName] has allowed them to prepare to break off into an entirely new state.
translation: 在$MONARCH$的默许下，$COUNTRY$的哥萨克已然发展壮大，并将自行决定自己的去向。他们在草原和[Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]的很多事情上拥有着巨大影响力,这让他们决定摆脱我们的统治去成立一个新国家。

original: We should have seen this coming...
Our government is run by and for the aristocracy. To adopt a more centralized administration we will need to curtail their power and privileges.
translation: 我们的政府已经转型成官僚体制。为了加强中央集权,我们将会削弱贵族的势力和特权。

original: Our state church wields a great deal of influence over the secular matters of the state. To limit their influence on state matters we will need to curtail their power and privileges.
translation: 我国教会堂区对国家的世俗事务有着巨大的影响力.为了限制他们的影响力,我们必须削弱他们的力量和回收特权.

original: Through bribery and corruption, the Burghers have a stranglehold on our government. To seize control back from these merchants we will need to curtail their power and privileges.
translation: 通过权钱交易，市民阶层已经垄断了我们的政府。为了从这些商人手中夺回控制权，我们需要削弱他们的力量并收回特权。

original: The Tribes have made the Khan into their puppet, enforcing unwanted laws and traditions. To take the power back from them we will need to curtail their power and privileges.
translation: 部族阶层已将汗变成傀儡，强迫他制订一些不情愿的法律和传统习俗。为夺回权力我们需要夺取他们的势力和特权。

original: Host is generating Random New World and will be unresponsive for some time...
translation: 主机正在生成随机新大陆，因此会有段时间没反应……

original:
The overall effect of an Estate on the country depends on their Influence and Loyalty. At their current Influence level, the $ESTATE|Y$ can have the following possible effects on your country:

If Loyalty is above $HAPPY|Y$:
$POS$

If Loyalty is between $ANGRY|Y$ and $HAPPY|Y$:
$NEUTRAL$

If Loyalty is below $ANGRY|Y$:
$NEG$
translation:
一个阶层对国家的总体影响取决于他们的影响力和忠诚度。根据他们当前的影响力度，$ESTATE|Y$阶层可以对你的国家产生以下可能的影响：

若忠诚度高于$HAPPY|Y$：
$POS$

若忠诚度介于$ANGRY|Y$和$HAPPY|Y$之间：
$NEUTRAL$

若忠诚度低于$ANGRY|Y$：
$NEG$

original: Owner is NOT a Colonial Nation
translation: 所有者不是殖民地国家
所有者是一个殖民地国家

translation: §R不能被以强迫移民的理由宣战。§!

This game §GWILL§! count towards your Leaderboard Score.

translation: 这局游戏§R不会§!被统计到你的排行榜数据上。

translation: §R你不能打破停战协议直到 §!§Y$DATE$§!§R为止,由于你最近输掉了战争,并且主机已启用§!§Y$OPTION$§!§R 选项。§!

translation: §R由于你最近输掉了一场战争，并且主机已启用§!§Y$OPTION$§!§R选项，§!§Y$DATE$§!§R之前你不能卖出核心省份。§!

translation: §R你不能接受贷款直到§!§Y$DATE$§!§R为止,由于你最近输掉了一场战争,并且主机已启用§!§Y$OPTION$§!§R 选项。§!

translation: §R你不能释放附庸直到§!§Y$DATE$§!§R为止，由于你最近输掉了一场战争,并且主机已启用§!§Y$OPTION$§!§R 选项。§!

translation: §R你不能在叛军占领进度达 50% 前,接受叛军的要求,时间直到§!§Y$DATE$§!§R为止,由于你最近输掉了一场战争,并且主机已启用§!§Y$OPTION$§!§R 选项。§!

translation: §R你不能启用援助直到§!§Y$DATE$§!§R  为止,由于你最近输掉了一场战争,并且主机已启用§!§Y$OPTION$§!§R 选项。§!

translation: §R你无法送赠礼金直到§!§Y$DATE$§!§R 为止,由于你最近输掉了一场战争,并且主机已启用§!§Y$OPTION$§!§R 选项。§!

original: You cannot sell a province that is held by an Estate.
translation: 你不能出售由某个阶层占有的省份。

original: §RYou cannot return a province that is held by an Estate.§!
translation: §R你不能归还由某个阶层占有的省份。§!

translation: §R现在主机禁止创建自定义国家。§!

translation: §R$NUM$ 本局中自定义国家已被创建§!

original: Enable Custom Nation creation for all players.
translation: 对所有玩家启用创造自定义国家。

original: Custom Nation creation should be disabled until all players have joined if you are playing with Random New World or from a savegame.
translation: 你在游玩随机新大陆或者读取游戏进度时，创建自定义国家被禁用，直到所有玩家都加入后解禁。

original: §Y- Games with Custom Nations do not count toward the Leaderboard Scores.§!
translation: §Y－使用自定义国家开局的游戏不会被统计到排行榜数据上。§!

translation: §Y随机新大陆§!不能被启用，因为你开始游戏的年份晚于$DATE$。

translation: §Y－一个或多个DLC的状态被切换了，它们之前可能用于或未用于这个存档上。§!

translation: §R不能进贡超过100%战争分数价值的贡品§!

original: §RYou cannot demand tribute that requires more than 100% War Score.§!
translation: §R不能索取超过100%战争分数价值的贡品§!

original: The Brahmins have grown so powerful they assumed de facto control over our country.
translation: 婆罗门阶层发展得过于强大，以至于被认为是国家的真正掌控者。

original: The Vaishya trade guilds have grown so powerful that they have assumed de facto control over our country. Real political power now lies in the hands of these wealthy organizations.
translation: 吠舍商会发展得过于强大，以至于被认为是国家的真正掌控者。国家权柄被掌握在富有的商会手中。

original: The Marathas have grown so powerful that they have broken off to form a country of their own, outside of our control.
translation: 马拉塔阶层发展得过于强大，以至于脱离了我们的掌控，分裂出去并成立了一个属于他们自己的国家。

original: The Rajputs have grown so powerful that they have broken off to form a country of their own, outside of our control.
translation: 拉杰普特阶层发展得过于强大，以至于脱离了我们的掌控，分裂出去并成立了一个属于他们自己的国家。

original: The Jains have grown so powerful they assumed de facto control over our country.
translation: 耆那教徒阶层的势力发展得过于强大，以至于被认为是国家的真正掌控者。
控制省份: §Y$VAL$%§!（据真实值§Y$REAL_VAL$%§!修正）

original: The $ESTATE|Y$ control $AMT|Y$ of the State development in $COUNTRY|Y$.
translation: $ESTATE|Y$阶层在$COUNTRY|Y$所控制的领地发展度为$AMT|Y$。

original: The $ESTATE|Y$ have a loyalty level of $LOYALTY|Y$.\nLoyalty is determined by your past actions towards this Estate and will change towards $NEUTRAL|Y$ every month.
translation: $ESTATE|Y$阶层的忠诚度为$LOYALTY|Y$。\n忠诚度取决于你过去对该阶层采取的行动，且每月将改变趋向$NEUTRAL|Y$。

original: The $ESTATE|Y$ have an influence level of $INFLUENCE$ ($REAL_INFLUENCE$ before cap) due to:
translation: $ESTATE|Y$阶层的影响力为$INFLUENCE$（受限前的真实影响力为$REAL_INFLUENCE$），原因如下：

original: Do you wish to grant $PROVINCE|Y$ to the $ESTATE|Y$?
This will increase their loyalty by $AMT|G$ (to $TOTAL$), influence by $INFLUENCE|Y$ (to $TOTAL2|Y$) and percentage of land by $TERRITORY|Y$ (to $TOTAL3|Y$).
translation: 这将提高他们$AMT|G$忠诚度（到$TOTAL$）、$INFLUENCE|Y$影响力（到$TOTAL2|Y$）和$TERRITORY|Y$控制土地占比（到$TOTAL3|Y$）。

original: This will increase their loyalty by $AMT|G$ (to $TOTAL$) and percentage of land by $TERRITORY|Y$ (to $TOTAL3|Y$). Influence will not change due to being already over $TOTAL2|Y$ cap.
translation: 这将提高他们$AMT|G$忠诚度（到$TOTAL$）和$TERRITORY|Y$控制土地占比（到$TOTAL3|Y$）。影响力早已超过上限$TOTAL2|Y$，因此不会改变。

original: This will increase their loyalty by $AMT|G$ (to $TOTAL$) and percentage of land by $TERRITORY|Y$ (to $TOTAL3|Y$). Influence will not change due to being already over $TOTAL2|Y$ province cap.
translation: 这将提高他们$AMT|G$忠诚度（到$TOTAL$）和$TERRITORY|Y$控制土地占比（到$TOTAL3|Y$）。影响力早已超过省份上限$TOTAL2|Y$，因此不会改变。

original: This will decrease their loyalty by $AMT|R$ (to $TOTAL$) and percentage of land by $TERRITORY|Y$ (to $TOTAL3|Y$). Influence will still remain over $TOTAL2|Y$ cap.
translation: 这将降低他们$AMT|R$的忠诚度 (到$TOTAL$)，$TERRITORY|Y$的土地占有率(到$TOTAL3|Y$)。影响力仍会高于$TOTAL2|Y$的上限。

original: This will decrease their loyalty by $AMT|R$ (to $TOTAL$) and percentage of land by $TERRITORY|Y$ (to $TOTAL3|Y$). Influence will not change due to province influence remaining over $TOTAL2|Y$ cap.
translation: 这将降低他们$AMT|R$忠诚度（到$TOTAL$）和$TERRITORY|Y$控制土地占比（到$TOTAL3|Y$）。影响力早已超过省份上限$TOTAL2|Y$，因此不会改变。

original: Resets score & victory cards between ages.
translation: 在时代间重置计分和胜利卡。

original: We cannot afford to anger the Cossacks.
translation: 我们无法承受哥萨克的怒火。
哥萨克阶级影响力的提升

original: The deep distrust of the Cossacks for the state in general and our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] in particular has culminated in a total breakdown of authority on the steppes. The communities of the Cossacks are openly hostile to our emissaries and de facto now act entirely independent from central authority.
translation: 我国大部分的哥萨克阶级是不信任我国的,尤其是对[Root.Monarch.GetTitle],他在草原的权威早已荡然无存.哥萨克阶级的村落公开的敌视我们派往的使者,并实际上完全由中央权威之下独立出去.

original: Reclaim the land from the Cossacks.
translation: 从哥萨克手中收回领土。

original: The Vaishyas of several prominent cities are accusing the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ of being greedy and indolent. The pious commoners are now withholding the tithe in a protest against a particularly bad example of misuse of the authority of the $ESTATE_CHURCH$. Pious Vaishyas are now objecting to paying tithes to the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ as they consider the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ unfit to receive them.\nThe $ESTATE_CHURCH$ are furious and demand that we fine the obstinate Vaishyas.
translation: 几个重要城市的吠舍阶层指责$ESTATE_CHURCH$的贪婪懒惰。虔诚的平民现在拒交什一税，以抗议$ESTATE_CHURCH$滥用权力这一个极坏的例子。虔诚的吠舍阶层现在拒绝给$ESTATE_CHURCH$交纳什一税，因为他们觉得$ESTATE_CHURCH$不配收这笔税金。\n$ESTATE_CHURCH$很愤怒，并要求我们对顽固的吠舍阶层罚款。

original: Expensive clothes, great banquettes and impressive palaces are some of the most visible symbols of the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ but the degree to which one family has money to spend on such things can vary greatly. In some cases the Vaishyas of our country are able to spend just as lavishly if not more so than the average noble. While there are old rules and traditions restricting such things for those of less noble birth these are hard to enforce efficiently. This is unacceptable to the powerful $ESTATE_NOBLES$ of our country who are now demanding that we update our laws on what an outsider can and cannot wear. They now suggest a number of heavy fines for anyone trying to rise visibly above their betters.
translation: 昂贵的衣服，精美的长椅和令人印象深刻的宫殿是$ESTATE_NOBLES$的一些最明显的标志，但是一个家庭有多少钱花在这些事情上可能差别很大。在某些情况下，我们国家的吠舍阶层能够像普通贵族那样花费奢侈。尽管旧的规则和传统限制了那些种姓不高的人的生活，但这些规则和传统很难有效地执行。这对我们国家强大的$ESTATE_NOBLES$来说是不可接受的，他们现在要求我们更新关于外人能够和不能穿什么的法律。他们现在建议对任何试图明显超过其上等种姓的标准的人处以巨额罚款。

original: As the state and its bureaucracy grow there is an ever-growing need of people to oversee and administrate various lands and functions. The $ESTATE_NOBLES$ have traditionally been more associated with military services to the state but have increasingly made it clear that they still expect to be first in line when government offices are being handed out. The Vaishyas on the other hand claim that the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ considers such appointments as mere rewards and will use them only to enrich themselves. Instead the Vaishyas argue we should appoint men out of individual merit.\nThe unexpected death of a trusted secretary has left a vacant position to be filled at the center of this conflict, with the Vaishyas supporting one candidate and the $ESTATE_NOBLES$ expecting us to pick another. While both candidates are talented men this has to be a political decision.
translation: 随着国家及其官僚机构的发展，国家日益需要对各种土地与职务监督和管理的人。传统上，$ESTATE_NOBLES$和国家军事兵役紧密相连，但是事实越来越清楚地表明，他们同样期望掌管政府所分配的文职。另一方面，吠舍声称$ESTATE_NOBLES$认为这些任命仅仅是利益交换，只会用来壮大自身阶层。相反，吠舍阶层认为我们应该出于普罗大众的利益而任命他们。\n一位值得信赖的顾问的意外死亡，留下了一个空缺职位来填补这场冲突的中心，吠舍阶层支持一位候选人，而$ESTATE_NOBLES$期望我们选择另一位。虽然两位候选人都是有才华的人，但我们必须作出一项政治抉择。

original: Let us turn to the Brahmins instead.
translation: 让我们交由婆罗门管理。
哥萨克人挣脱了我们的统治

original: Maratha leaders have come to exercise such far-ranging authority over large areas of our state that it has now come to the point where the $MONARCHTITLE$ has had to accept that [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] no longer has any practical control over them. With the crowning of a leader of their own the transition is complete and our loss of authority over the Marathas total.
translation: 马拉塔的领导人已经开始对我们州的大部分地区行使如此广泛的权力，现在它已经到了$MONARCHTITLE$必须接受[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]不再对它们进行任何实际控制的程度。随着他们自己的领导人的加冕，权力的交接完成了。我们失去了对马拉塔的权威。

original: We should have seen this coming...

$MONARCH$ has allowed the Brahmins of $COUNTRY$ to grow too powerful and now they have made their move. While keeping the common people in line through their ties with the divine the Brahmins have used every one of the many means available to them to seize the reins of government. While still ruler in name our $MONARCHTITLE$ is now little more than their puppet.
translation: 在$MONARCH$的默许下，$COUNTRY$的婆罗门变得过于强大。婆罗门通过控制普通大众的精神纽带，从而夺取了对政府的控制。虽然他们依旧效忠我们，但是$MONARCHTITLE$俨然已经成为他们的傀儡。

original: We should have seen this coming...
[Root.GetName] will now be controlled by the §YBrahmins§! until the §Y'Curtail the Brahmins'§! decision is taken.
translation: 采用§Y「削弱婆罗门」§!决议前[Root.GetName]将受§Y婆罗门§!阶层控制。

original: Using a wide range of measures the $MONARCHTITLE$ has managed to strip the Brahmins of the many offices they held and the properties under their control. The authority over the worldly realm lies once again in the hands of $MONARCH$.
translation: $MONARCHTITLE$暗度陈仓，最终成功将婆罗门控制的众多职务以及旗下财产收归国有。$MONARCH$掌握的世俗权威将再一次统治国家。

original: $MONARCH$ has allowed the Vaishyas of $COUNTRY$ to grow too powerful and now they have made their move. Making use of their many hard-earned privileges as well as the many debts owed to them, they have effectively seized the reins of government and turned the $MONARCHTITLE$ into little more than their puppet.
translation: 在$MONARCH$的默许下，$COUNTRY$ 的吠舍变得过于强大,现在他们已经采取了下一步行动。依靠大范围的商业特权和收放高利贷,他们有效地掌握了政府的命脉,让$MONARCHTITLE$成为了他们的傀儡。

original: We should have seen this coming...
[Root.GetName] will now be controlled by the §YVaishyas§! until the §Y'Curtail the Vaishyas'§! decision is taken.
translation: 采用§Y「削弱吠舍」§!决议前[Root.GetName]将受§Y吠舍§!阶层控制。

original: We have finally managed to break our reliance on the Vaishyas, reclaiming control over all important state functions and reducing these peddlers to their rightful confines within the city walls.
translation: 我们终于设法打破了对吠舍的依赖，恢复了对所有重要国家职能的控制，并将这些商贩限制在城墙内。

original: Rajput leaders have come to exercise such far-ranging authority over large areas of our state that it has now come to the point where the $MONARCHTITLE$ has had to accept that [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] no longer has any practical control over them. With the crowning of a leader of their own the transition is complete and our loss of authority over the Rajputs total.
translation: 拉杰普特的领袖们在我国已在相当范围内有很高的权威，这权威使得$MONARCHTITLE$不得不接受[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] 已不再对他们有任何实际的控制权这个事实。他们自封的统治者的加冕，标志着我们对拉杰普特的控制已经完全丧失。

original: We should have seen this coming...

$MONARCH$ has allowed the Jains of $COUNTRY$ to grow too powerful and now they have made their move. Making use of their many hard-earned privileges as well as the many debts owed to them, they have effectively seized the reins of government and turned the $MONARCHTITLE$ into little more than their puppet.
translation: 在$MONARCH$的默许下，$COUNTRY$的耆那教徒变得过于强大，现在他们已经采取了下一步行动。依靠大范围的商业特权和收放高利贷，他们有效地掌握了政府的命脉，让$MONARCHTITLE$成为了他们的傀儡。

original: We should have seen this coming...
[Root.GetName] will now be controlled by the §YJains§! until the §Y'Curtail the Jains'§! decision is taken.
translation: 采用§Y「削弱耆那教徒」§!决议前[Root.GetName]将受§Y耆那教徒§!阶层控制。

original: We have finally managed to break our reliance on the Jains, reclaiming control over all important state functions and reducing them to their rightful confines within the city walls.
translation: 我们终于设法打破了对耆那教徒的依赖，恢复了对所有重要国家职能的控制，并将他们限制在城墙内。

original: The Brahmins wield a great deal of influence over the secular matters of the state. To limit their influence on state matters we will need to curtail their power and privileges.
translation: 婆罗门对国家的世俗事务有着巨大的影响力。为了限制他们的影响力，我们必须削弱他们的力量和回收特权。

original: Through bribery and corruption, the Vaishyas have a stranglehold on our government. To seize control back from these merchants we will need to curtail their power and privileges.
translation: 通过权钱交易，吠舍已经垄断了我们的政府。为了从这些商人手中夺回控制权，我们需要削弱他们的力量并收回特权。

original: The Jains have a stranglehold on our government. To seize control back from them we will need to curtail their power and privileges.
translation: 耆那教徒已经垄断了我们的政府。为了从他们手中夺回控制权，我们需要削弱他们的力量并收回特权。

original: $ESTATE$ have no effect since they have §Y0%§! Influence.
translation: $ESTATE$阶层因§Y0%§!的影响力没有对国家产生影响。

original: The overall effect of an Estate on the country depends on their Influence and Loyalty. $ESTATE|Y$ have no effect since they have §Y0%§! Influence.
translation: 一个阶层对国家的总体影响取决于他们的影响力和忠诚度。$ESTATE|Y$阶层因§Y0%§!的影响力没有对国家产生影响。

original: Using $VAL|Y$ gathered power for $NAME|Y$ will have the following effect.
translation: 消耗$VAL|Y$点数选择「$NAME|Y$」，将会有以下影响：

original: By using $VAL|Y$ gathered power for $NAME|Y$, we will raise Development in a random category by $CHANGE|G$ in one province and the country they fled from will get the following negative effects:\n$MOD$
translation: 使用$VAL|Y$点数选择$NAME|Y$，我们能够在一个省份内增加随机一项发展度$CHANGE|G$点，他们逃离的国家则会受到以下负面影响：\n$MOD$

original: Serfs from rival and neighboring countries will not flee to our country since all our provinces have a culture and religion that is accepted in their own country.
translation: 我们宿敌和临近国家的农奴不会投奔我们，除非我们所有的省份都有他们所接受的文化和宗教。

original: We must open our arms to the oppressed serfs that toil under foreign nobles. These men and women will shortly be productive members of our society if we just free them from their overlords.
translation: 我们必须对被外国领主压迫着的农奴敞开怀抱。一旦我们将这些人从他们领主手中解放出来，他们就会迅速成为我们社会中能干的成员。

original: Let us assemble a raiding party and use our unique affinity for the steppes to quickly descend upon the cities and manors of the oppressive kingdoms that surround us.
translation: 让我们召集一个游牧部落并利用我们对草原的独特亲和力来快速到达我们周围暴君治下的城市和庄园。

original: The time has come to assemble a host of Cossacks to wage war on our enemies and defend the home of all free steppe men and women.
translation: 是时候召集一批哥萨克人来跟敌人作战并保卫所有草原子民了。

original: Free Cossacks are ruled by a military council presided over by a Hetman.
translation: 自由哥萨克人由一个盖特曼主持的军事委员会统治。

original: Free Cossacks are ruled by a military council presided over by a Hetman.
translation: 自由哥萨克人由一个盖特曼主持的军事委员会统治。

original: A neighboring Cossack state has entised our serfs to flee from our caring overlordship.
translation: 一个临近的哥萨克部落已诱惑我们的农奴逃离我们的统治。

original: We have assembled raiding parties to make the steppes a living hell for our enemies while also increasing our own manouverability and strength here.
translation: 我们组建了突击队，使大草原成为我们敌人活生生的地狱，同时也增加了我们自己的机动性和力量。

original: We have armed the Cossacks, many of whom now stand ready to be assigned to a regiment.
translation: 我们已经将哥萨克们武装了起来，他们即将被编为一个团。

original: Moving quickly by boat or on horseback, the Cossacks of the steppes are very adept raiders. Several such raids have lately laid waste to our countryside and even major cities some way from our borders. Once the raids have been executed these plunderers retreat back behind the borders of [cossacks_here_target.GetName] as quickly as they came. The $ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$ have interests in the affected areas and demand that we do something.
translation: 依靠船只及快马迅速移动的哥萨克人十分擅长各种奇袭。几次的突然袭击几乎把我国的边境甚至一些主要城市洗劫一空。这些强盗抢劫完后，就立刻退回[cossacks_here_target.GetName]的边界内。$ESTATE_NOMADIC_TRIBES$对那些受到侵袭的地区很感兴趣，并要求我们做点什么。

original: Moving quickly by boat or on horseback, the Cossacks of the steppes are very adept raiders. Several such raids have lately laid waste to our countryside and even major cities some way from our borders. Once the raids have been executed these plunderers retreat back behind the borders of [cossacks_here_target.GetName] as quickly as they came. Our local authorities in the affected areas are now demanding that we do something.
translation: 依靠船只及快马迅速移动的哥萨克人十分擅长各种奇袭。几次的突然袭击几乎把我国的边境甚至一些主要城市洗劫一空。这些强盗抢劫完后，就立刻退回[cossacks_here_target.GetName]的边界内。我国受侵袭地区的地方政府要求我们做些什么。

original: The Dhimmi have a stranglehold on our government. To seize control back from them, we will need to curtail their power and privileges.
translation: 齐米已经垄断了我们的政府。为了从他们手中夺回控制权，我们需要削弱他们的力量并收回特权。
